comments: Irene is a lovely and very helpfully host with a very nice place, tidy and clean. Recommended!

Jamie's apartment overlooking Manly Beach was right on the Ocean .Very open and spacious. Also very handy for local restaurants and shops.
Jamie was most welcoming and we had a great stay , although we were unlucky with the weather for a few days.
Would recommend this apartment for anyone who likes being near a beach.

Great Place and Great Host!
Definitely recommend staying here!
10/10!

We had a returning guests we couldn't accommodate for their requested period. After getting in touch with Ziggy we were very happy with communication, the guests gave good feedback about the property, we will be thinking of Ziggy's apartment whenever we can help a guest. 
Thanks Ziggy!

Emma's White House was perfect for my husbands long stay for work purposes.
He had everything he needed and Na (the host) was awesome.... extremely pleasant and helpful. She always made sure that his stay was comfortable. Communication was prompt and efficient.
The location was quiet, safe and close to amenities. The unit is away from the house and he wasn't disturbed by noise.
It was fantastic value for money and he would most definitely stay here again. I highly recommend this Airbnb to others. 
Thanks Na for making the time away from home so pleasant.

房東人很好,熱情,訊息都有即時回覆
感謝Jill這幾天的照顧

Michy and Paul are such great hosts. They made feel very welcome as soon as I arrived. The backyard cabin is newly renovated. It is very clean, modern, classy and quiet. It is very close to the beach. I will definitely come back again. Thank you Michy and Paul!

The house is a lovely open space surrounded by trees. The beaches are beautiful, closeby and easy to drive to. So much to do outdoors, and lots of restaurants and cafes in the area for the evening. The house is stocked withe an entire kitchen of stuff which was great. It was a really nice winter stay in the school holidays. The host brought us a  beautiful welcome hamper of teas, coffee, chocolates and wine, etc.  Very nice.
It was close to the airport and very clean. Highly recommended

Highly recommended apartment. It's spacious, clean, stylish and very easily accessible from the mascot subway and buses. Near the airport as well. Evan is also very prompt in responding so we really appreciated that. Thanks, we enjoyed our stay!

Phan went out of her way to meet us at her place and had plenty of information about the neighbourhood, etc.  The apartment was clean and well equipped.  It was a great place for a good price and close to everything we needed.

Aimee & Dan's place is located in a vibrant part of the city. A walk or short bike or bus ride to many of the attractions on offer. Particularly good for attending any concert or sporting event at Alliance or Sydney Cricket ground.  The apartment is stylish providing all the comforts of home. The facilities are amazing with a gym and pool in the complex and many restaurants & cafes just downstairs. Thank you for sharing your home Aimee & Dan.

Stayed with Kerri as we needed somewhere close to the family (who have grown too much to fit us into their small house). Beautiful apartment and a lovely bedroom and bathroom for our use.  Kerri is a great host and a really nice person - with excellent taste.  We'd be happy to recommend her place to anyone and be happy to stay there again.

It was a nice apartment to stay in and it is worth the price. 
The only problem in the area is parking, as it is challenging to find a free spot- since we owned a car. There are also planes flying over the complexes, therefore there will be some noise, but not often- it wasn’t as noticeable for us. 
Otherwise it was a nice stay with all appliances and necessities provided- also Hafid was fast to respond to our messages. Recommend.
We had a great time staying with Susan in Bronte. The place is self contained and quiet. Susan had thought of everything.  The place really was perfect.  We can't recommend this place highly enough!
The host canceled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Roomies were all very friendly, and room was clean!
A warming and cleaning house, it is convenient for walking to city. Andrew is a friendly guy as well.

This room and apartment are a great little find - in a lovely quiet area in Rozelle with great transport links into the city via bus and walking distance to some awesome pubs & into Balmain. You could also walk into the CBD in 40 mins (which we did a few times across the Anzac Bridge).
We stayed with Duncan and Ashlee for three weeks and they are perfect hosts - gave us space to do our own thing but always there if we needed advice on Sydney (it was our first time to the city) and generally great company.
The room itself is spacious and well furnished with plenty of space for storage, the bed was really comfy with an electric blanket for when the nights got a little chilly, and Duncan's information sheet in the bedroom was a great reference point. Kitchen, Living Room and Bathroom are ample sized and well equipped. There is nothing I can fault this property on nor the hosts - a great first experience of Airbnb and Sydney for us. Thank you so much guys!
Beach and Surf :D

Lovely house & well maintained. 

Everything you could need for a comfortable stay is provided. There were 4 adults & 2 children in our party, and there was more than enough space.
Pool is a very welcome addition- especially to escape the Sydney heat!
Wouldn’t think twice about rebooking if we’re ever fortunate to be in Sydney again!

Unfortunately Isabella was not there so we never actually met, but the room was very cosy and the location beautiful, right in front of a picturesque park in Newtown and a very short walking distance to the main street with an almost endless choice of great bars, restaurants and cafes, would definitly stay here again :)

Kate's place was great! I'd definitely stay again.  It was very clean and her roommates are wonderful--very chill and easy to live with.Kate was very considerate of any concerns I had as well and do all she could to ensure I was comfortable.

A lovely apartment in beautiful Bondi. It matches the new photos and the Bondi beach area is easily walkable. It's a bus ride to downtown Sydney - pretty easy. 

There are a lot of stairs if that bothers you, and no AC. The street is quiet and a very short walk to shops, restaurants, beaches, pools, boutiques and some of the best walking paths (in the world?).
非常干净舒适的房间,适合旅行的朋友入住｡

What a fantastic apartment right next to Central Station. This opens up the entire city to you through the trains, buses and light rail. Use the Opal card to save on costs. The living room is well laid out and the couch is well built and comfortable. The TV is run through the Internet so there are many options to chose from. The closest market is downstairs and a small Woolworth a block away. The unit is in a secure building and on the top floor for great views. If you like trains, you will love it more! The kitchen has everything to make your own meals, which we did. When we arrived Alexey and Olga had a lovely bottle of wine waiting for us. Very thoughtful and considerate host. The bed was very comfortable. We used the downstairs bathroom with the large tub and shower, so convenient. The stairs are easily manageable but not for wheelchair users. The bathroom upstairs has a shower and the washer and dryer. That is such a plus for travelers. I would say we were able to enjoy our week in Sydney so much more because we rented this apartment. This is the very best value to be found and we're thankful we booked it. Highly recommend and would book it again if in Sydney.

Bernadette and Fred were excellent hosts - warm, friendly and welcoming. Correspondence before our visit was great and instructions to the property were clear. The property itself was perfect - we couldn't have asked for more. Our area and the communal areas were spotless and we felt very comfortable in Bernadette and Fred's home. The house is stunning and views are beautiful, and it worked so well with our own living room, bathroom, bedroom and separate entrance. We couldn't have asked for a better experience!
交通便捷,靠近地跌和公交车站,很方便去市中心和DFO,附近有超市和购物中心, 房间很整洁,布置的很温馨,房主很nice,性价比很高,是一次极好的入住体验

We absolutely loved our time at Leah’s! The location was amazing, super close to the train station so it was a breeze getting around. The place itself was modern, very clean, spacious, had all the amenities you need and more! Would recommend to anyone, thanks again :)
Every thing was good, we asked for a latter check out and she had no problem!
Perfect AirBnb! Highly recommend.
Treen’s place is lovely, clean and charming. A great place to relax if you’re coming for a holiday, and its location to nearby shops, cafes, and Bondi beach is icing on the cake. Highly recommended.
Very good location, walking distance to the beach. Great communication with Shiki.

I can’t recommend this home highly enough.  It’s in a perfect location, close to shops and buses into town.
The house itself is lacking NOTHING!
It’s a lovely airy place with all the things you could need to just relax and chill.

Great position, within walking distance of all the major CBD attractions and inner city suburbs like Darlinghurst, Surry Hills and Woolloomooloo. 

Our host was very friendly and thorough, and easy to deal with. 

The accomodation itself was fine - 5 beds (incl 3 doubles) in 3 bedrooms.  Awesome easterly view from the 13th floor. Perfect for a boys weekend. The fridge didn't work although I can't mark my host down for that as I didn't contact her to give her a chance to fix.
great place that is clean and quiet. owners were very helpful and I would recommend this property to anyone.

After 10 days in such a fantastic terrace, I can say that Natasa is simply the perfect host, and even better person! Friendly, funny and flexible, she is always ready to help, to have a conversation and she makes you feel like at home as you enter the house. The house is clean and tidy, and the kitchen and living room are spacious and with all you may need. The room itself, with double bed, is a perfect and very comfortable place to relax as at home. The house is perfectly located 1 minute (or even less) form Petersham train station, from where you get to the city in a 10 minutes ride. There is also a supermarket and shops nearby, which make it easy to get provisions. Of course, the house has Wifi connection, which is fast and reliable.
This has been the first time I book a room through Airbnb and it has been such a fantastic experience that I will definitely consider Airbnb for further stays, and if in Sydney, at Natasa’s place for sure!

The apartment is very nice with a very good space and in  amazing location near the supermarket and public transport. There are a lot of beaches near the apartment and is easy to go to the center of Sydney. I recommend it.

We enjoyed staying at the Treetop Cottage on our visit to Sydney!  Bryan welcomed us warmly when we arrived and provided a tour and a description of all the amenities.  The two level cottage is a charming row house in the historic district of Glebe.  Our family was very comfortable (2 adults, 2 children), it was truly a home away from home.  Bryan thought of everything to make our visit comfortable; from great coffee, to comfortable bedding.  He even went out of his way to offer a wifi connection and Opal cards for public transportation.  We loved our Australian holiday and really enjoyed Sydney and the Treetop Cottage!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location, beautiful view.  A cozy place for a romantic getaway.
The location is superb and the habour view around five docks is astounding.

Carl was a wonderful host and his apartment is comfortable and cozy. The apartment has awesome views of the harbor bridge and sky -- in fact we enjoyed the outstanding Sydney new year fireworks from the comfort of the house without needing to brave the  crowds in the park :) Would love to be back.
房子整理的很整齊但是不知道為什麼很多蟑螂.....如果你不討厭蟑螂的話可以參考ˊㄜㄗ
What a great space! Walking distance to Newtown for dinner a big plus. A bit of noise from the nearby Westconnex works.
The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Gavin's place is very clean and well laid out and is ideally located close to Central Station. We stayed for four nights over New Years Eve and enjoyed our time immensely!

What we liked the most was the host! He is a very good person, respectful, cordial and polite at all times. He even made time to show us the tourist attractions as well as some of the local hotspots.

We shared some great evenings with Gavin and enjoyed the conversation on a range of interesting topics. During our stay, I also had the chance to introduce him to my favourite European drink "the Hugo" which went down a treat! ;)

We enjoyed staying in Surry Hills and can happily recommend the place and the host, and if given the chance would gladly stay there again.

Fantastic apartment! Great location, 5 minute walk to Bondi Beach, no hesitation in recommending this place to stay! Really nice modern feel to the apartment as well, felt right at home! Top it off with great views looking across Sydney from the Balcony! We'll be back for sure :)

I had an absolutely lovely week staying at Bj's comfortable home. The room itself was nicely equipped, with a comfortable bed, and plenty of space. I really enjoyed the little balcony too. I LOVED the neighborhood of Surry Hills too - so many cute shops and restaurants a hop away. Bj was super responsive and accommodating. I highly recommend a stay at Bj's home!

great location & place we extended our stay of initial 1 night to 6 more nights & then another night again! :) Donna was helpful and we had some common interests that she handed us her classic recipes, etc from her café for ours. all good luck with ur new ventures! :)
Great location and good facilities  would stay again in the future
Great House. Only there for two nights. Conveniently located good vibe
Appartement très bien placé
Fabulous host that made us feel very welcome and quickly assisted with anything we needed to feel comfortable. Great value for money. Great sunrises every morning from the lounge room.

I stayed at Nicole's place for my graduation. My parents were with me. We found the place quiet, neat and tidy. It's super convenient (museum station was a 10 min walk) and there are heaps of buses to various beaches. It's also close to shops and convenient stores. Nicole wasn't in town during our stay but she put me in touch with her friend who was very helpful during our stay. We highly recommend this place!

I absolutely love my stay at Kirsty's place. Photo/description  are accurate.House was very beautiful, very comfortable,  clean and spacious rooms, it was fully  stocked with everything we needed. A great location  close to beach and shop, easy to find. Fantastic  communication and hospitality, Kirsty is the    perfect  host.  10 / 10 I would definitely  rrecommend this home to anyone.

We had the pleasure of meeting Marina in Ian's Absence.
Ian's place was fantastic in terms of location, cleanness, hospitality, etc...
Ian, and Marina were easily accessible via email and phone. 
The only drawback was the renovation noise from other units in the building which was out of Ian's control and knowledge.
Overall, we found Ian's place a great place for travellers and would definitely recommend to anyone who has a plan to visit Sydney.

This is a high quality, furnished apartment about 5-10 minutes walk from some lovely beaches which are often deserted. The top-floor apartment itself is well kitted-out and clean and very quiet. Maree and her husband, who live downstairs, are very welcoming and kind. There is a bus very close to the apartment which takes just under an hour to get into the centre. There is a convenience store down the road.

On the downside, the kitchen is quite small and any cooking is based around plug-in hobs and woks which means that cooking for two was a bit of a challenge, but not impossible by any means. The pool is a reasonable size (not for lengths but for dipping in) but unfortunately was unusable for much of our stay. This was a bit of a disappointment, but the sea is not far away!

All in all, this was a nice stay with lovely hosts and I would recommend it to others.
The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excellent value. Close to heaps of public transport and a short walk to Marrickville. A Woolies less than 10 mins away. Very quiet and clean. Stayed here for a few weeks with husband and baby while locating permanent accommodation. It is small and basic but clean and and excellent location. There is a beautiful kids park around the corner and less than 10 mins walk to cooks river. Only 15 min bus ride to Enmore/Newtown. Communication was excellent and fruit and cookies were left out to.

It would be difficult to overestimate how fantastic Hannah was as a host. We arrived in Sydney having been let down only 24 hours before arriving when our previous host gave us a late cancellation. We needed a property that could accommodate five children and Hannah came up trumps.
Hannah remained in constant contact with us throughout that stressful arrival day and offered us her house for the week. She was an absolute lifesaver and rescued our holiday. (For the record, Lisa Peterson of L'Abode Accommodation let us down with the cancellation and never inquired about our welfare throughout our stay in Sydney !)
Onto the house, it was beautiful, well equipped and a perfect location. Hannah and her family greeted us on our arrival and made us feel at home. We did not need anything extra and had a fantastic stay. We exchanged a couple of mails with Hannah during the week and knowing she was available was great.
The shops are close - supermarkets / restaurants and it was quick and easy access to the City. Great spot.
As I previously said, Hannah went out of her way to assist us and we are so grateful. Her house is perfect and if we are in Sydney again, I wouldn't hesitate to call Hannah again. 10 / 10......

Lisa Peterson of L'Abode accommodation was just appalling. Just imagine arriving in a city 12,000 miles from home (Sydney from London) with a wife and five kids and having no accommodation, with it being cancelled just six hours before you got on the plane, but email and with no personalized apology. Then magnify that issue with a host that just didn't (and obviously still doesn't care). This has really affected my view of Airbnb and I am not an advocate of the process, especially as I appear to be unable to warm other travellers about L'Abode Accommodation. I suppose Trip Adviser might assist but Airbnb should consider this for future.

A gorgeous townhouse, with old world charm and modern features. The location is great, really central with yummy cafes within walking distance. Parking was easy too. The furnishings were all lovely and the kitchen is a great size and well equipped.

The bedroom was cosy with a sunroom at the front which was great to relax in, have a chat or read a book with a glass of wine. 

We'd definitely look to stay again next time we're visiting Sydney.
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Erin’s Airbnb is exactly like the photos it’s clean and stylish and so easy to check in. Such a beautiful Airbnb if you’re looking for a home away from home this Airbnb is the one you’d want to book!
Had a pleasant stay. Maria was friendly and helpful and the room was comfortable and clean.
Jess was extremely helpful & a great host. Lovely apartment close to public transport, lots of restaurants & bars close by.

The place is amazing, with everything you need. The location closed to most of the sightseeing places and 2 train station. Mike always response within 10mins and give valuable response. We definitely will reserve here again when we visit Sydney again.

Lizzy's Tamarama pad is a truly outstanding property.  It's amazingly well equipped, spacious, with stunning outlook (from an enormous terrace) and its beautifully maintained.  Lizzy is an absolute pleasure to deal with.  This is a unique property with a wonderful relaxed feel to it.  Also a perfect place to get some serious work done - its quite inspiring.
Nick & Ed were so warm welcoming & friendly. They helped me get settled in, recommended a good spot for dinner & left me alone. I slept peacefully & the location was perfect :)

Dino’s apartment is presented at an exceptional boutique-hotel standard with additions such as a full working kitchen, laundry and fresh linen. The position of the apartment is in one of Sydney’s most sort after locations and just moments (2 minutes) walk to Sydney Harbour. The view through to the water past the iconic Moreton Bay Fig tree is tranquil and beautiful. 

The man himself is a perfect host whom is both easy going and professional. He was a pleasure to converse with as well. 

The apartment is decorated immaculately in a light and white Sydney contemporary style with controllable lighting, a HiFi stereo as well as a large television in both the lounge and main bedroom.

The main bedroom has a view through the trees from the balcony to Elizabeth Bay and is fairly envy making. You can keep all the windows and balcony door open with no fear of intruders due to the height. That makes it an even nicer space to come home to after a day in the sun.

In addition, it’s the little details that make this place stand out. Things such as a quality iron and ironing board for business shirts, a washer that come with good detergent as opposed to the cheapest and about a thousand fresh towels. It is effectively a luxury home.

I had friends over for dinner and we were stunned at the quality of the kitchen equipment as well as the number of serving platters, tumblers, champagne and wine glasses.

When I lived in the country years ago and nearby, finding a car space could take hours. Dino has a car space with electronic entry. It's the envy of the area and a bonus for anyone hiring a car.

I thoroughly recommend this apartment, which will probably be permanently booked out when people find out how good it is.
The host was very friendly and the location was prime

Wow! What a lovely house! Freshly painted, beautiful old floorboards, ( they are floorboards so a bit squeaky!)  clean minimalist furnishings, and in a QUIET area of Randwick about 17 minutes from the airport, and straight down Coogee Bay Rd  to the ocean. You have the SPOT around the corner, and the best Japanese, on Belmore Rd ( TEN). Best of all there is a garage, because parking in this area is a big problem.  Thank you so much Simone and John for your kindness in accommodating us. We had a lovely stay.
The reservation was canceled 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The host is crazy but don’t worry about the knife.
The house isn’t clean but if you like the cockroach that’s ok.

Verry good place, good bed , good explainations , we appreciated swiming and jaccuzi after whole day discoverring Sydney, more for young people , so Nice thanks we recommand this place verry cheap and good.

Great location, 10 minutes walk from the beach, really nice setting,  quiet. Justine made sure we would be comfortable. Lovely soaps, croissants orange juice and jam was a nice touch. would definitely go back.
Great apartment and everything we needed was there. Ideal location and very comfortable. Enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you Ant for making it so easy ;)

Richard is an extremely nice and cool dude who welcomed to his home. The pool was absolutely splendid and the house!. His house is just up the road from the beach which is very convenient and the neighbourhood is quiet.

Clean, basic accommodation and a convenient base during our stay in the northern beaches district of Sydney. Loved waking up to the sound of the birds! I recommend the short walk down to Paradise beach. Cathy, David and Max were great, and made sure we had everything we needed without making a fuss. Thanks!

This house is perfect for an inner city getaway. Beautiful terrace house, very comfortable and Kassandra was lovely and made everything so easy. Highly recommended for location, so close to king st and enmore rd for great restaurants , cafes and bars etc and even marrickville metro when you just need some groceries. A really relaxing beautiful place.

This stunning place is definately the best accommodation we've had in australia! They make one feel very at home and let you take part on the good vibes ! It's tidy and very comfi.. I really recomend this place for everyone who likes to be surrounded by good people! 
thanks
It was great to stay in this place. It was easy communicating with Lina and the neighbors are OK.

Such a magical spot! My boyfriend and I booked a spontaneous weekend away to this little slice of paradise and were actually surprised and stoked that it totally exceeded our expectations. The view is stunning, the space is immaculately clean, very modern and minimalistic in design, yet has everything you need.. plenty of storage space for a longer stay, as well as kitchen appliances and beautiful stove. Comfy couch that converts into a double bed, TV with netflix, etc.. Our hosts were so friendly and accommodation, it actually felt sad to leave! We live just over the bridge, so we're happy we'll be able to make our stays at Ian's place a more regular thing!

Naturally the first thing that is most unique about staying at Andy’s place is that you are living in an attic/loft with 2 skylight windows that bring in plenty of sunshine! It’s not everyday you get to wake up with the sun shining down on you which made waking up very pleasant just busking in the morning light. 

Second of all, I don’t think we’ve ever been on a more comfortable bed. Every night we fall asleep so easily and soundly and every morning it takes us ages to get off the bed because it’s really just that comfortable. You have to try it to believe it.

While Andy wasn’t around in the place, her friend Jacque was and she was the warmest person ever. We were late checking in on the first night and she waited for us to get back so she could welcome us in. 

The toilets are also very extremely clean and well fitted, hot water readily available.

Andy also lives in a really nice quiet neighbourhood that isn't too far off from the city too, which is great cos travelling is convenient and you still get to come home to peace and quiet. That being said, there are plenty of great cafe's and eateries around the neighbourhood, so if you feel like avoiding the city hustle, you're covered.

All in all, we can’t recommend Andy’s place enough and we will definitely be back again soon!

Great location and sunny apartment. Fabulous hosts. Views of the water are enticing. Short walking distance to Bondi Road for fabulous local shopping options for groceries, fresh f&v, seafood and supplies. We will definitely be back!
The apartment was close to bondi junction shops and bondi beach. Only really suitable for two guests. The bed was comfy and there was plenty of storage for suitcases and clothes

Joseph is welcoming you and the apartment get a lovely terrace to have lovely moment !
We enjoy the barbecue and have a very good rest.

This place was adorable, with lovely details and personal touches - just perfect for my needs. The area had a great vibe, and the location so close to cafes and transport, made getting around and eating out so easy. I will definitely stay again, perhaps a week next time, as it was also very affordable.

We loved staying at this home the night before and night of our wedding- it was spacious, well appointed and beautiful! The host Rachel goes out of her way to help you and ensure you have everything you need.

Would highly recommend- thanks!

Gwen was a fantastic host. She was very accommodating of our late arrival and very early departure. The apartment was exactly as we imagined with a lot of natural light, sleek "beachy" decor and only a 5 min walk to the beach, everything you need for a perfect weekend away. I would definitely stay with Gwen again.

Spend a great 2 nights at Vickie's studio. Well decorated, had everything we need and surprisingly spacious. It was my first time in Sydney, so the location was just perfect; many good cafes and restaurants near by.

Vickie is an amazing host, she made sure we were comfortable and well adjusted. Great person to communicate with.
Lovely apartment in a great position. Hosts Tessa and Rod are delightful and a pleasure to deal with.

I loved staying at this adorable apartment. 
The location is amazing, literally metres to the beach and handy to everything. The apartment is modern, clean and very well equipped, I had everything I needed for a perfect getaway in Bondi.
The bed was super comfortable and the kitchen and bathroom are immaculate.
But the best part was waking up, walking outside and having gorgeous Bondi Beach at my doorstep.
Heavenly! Thank you Natasha, I will be back.
The host canceled this reservation 186 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Millie's studio was perfect! Fantastic location, easy walk to the train and amazing views of the bridge. 

Millie was quick to respond to my questions and very accommodating with my early check in. Would 100% stay her again. 

Thanks Millie :)

We had a great stay at the apartment. It is located in a beautiful spot, ten minutes walking distance to Paradise Beach. Fully equipped. Molly was very helpful and made our stay so easy. Totally recommendable.

Frances and Bruno are two very lovely hosts! Their house is a gem in an amazing suburb and the room is clean, big and airy! They respect your privacy but are always up for a chat if you feel like it. I really enjoyed their company and hospitality. And they will do all they can to make your stay the best it can be! 
In Short: Their Airbnb is the place to go if you’re in Sydney!
Very very kind and helpful people!!! Great hosts!

We had a wonderful time at Adams place. The Flat was clean and hab everything you could need. 5 mins to KingsCross
Alex
Lower your expectation! :)
Very good host, helpful and responsible, room is tidy and comfortable, definitely come back

This was a great place to stay. Heaps of room for an inner city apartment in a leafy area. Great views from the deck. Sara met us in the carpark and showed us to the apartment and was friendly and informative about access to shops, transport and to the city. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook a meal and the shops and fish market are really close to source ingredients. We'd definitely stay here again. Very clean and homely.

Underwhelmed is a word that comes to mind to describe my stay.  While the location is good being close to the main hub of Glebe, the general condition of the premises is poor.  Several parts of the apartment are in a state of disrepair including the blind in the main bedroom which is hanging by a cable tie and  is completely dysfunctional.  The TV is also not working and has been out of action for some time which is not clearly stated in ad.

Great place, location and room. Fiona was a great host and she also let us use a tv room in the second floor. Room and bathroom were clean and we had everything we needed. She provided guidance on public transport and places to visit. Jackson, her dog, is lovely and very calm. We definitely recommend this. place.
Great location for my needs with much needed parking. Pete was a great host who could accommodate my needs with no issues at all. Look forward to staying with him again on my next visit.

My partner and I had an amazing experience a Daniel's place! The house and room were both clean and comfortable. Laura (his housemate) and him made sure we had everything we needed, respecting our privacy and being very open during encounters. They are both very laid back and enjoyable. We stayed there for a month and ended up becoming great friends, they are very lovely!
Great location, very comfortable and convenient to transport, walking paths, supermarkets, restaurants etc
Great Location from everything we needed, would stay here again and highly recommend to friends!

Su was an exceptionally accommodating host and her apartment is as lovely and well appointed as it looks! Su was extremely responsive and helpful in the lead-up to my arrival.
 Unfortunately, I had to cut my trip short because of a personal issue in my family, and Su couldn't have been more understanding or gracious about the situation

The hosts Elizabeth and Simon are extremely welcoming hosts with lots of helpful tips to get around Sydney. The room was well appointed, very clean and comfortable with a gorgeous private marble bathroom located nearby. There are a few stairs but easily manageable with luggage. Elizabeth provided a concise list of all information making access to the Internet and building really easy. Would highly recommend this location for an awesome holiday experience. The hosts have gone above and beyond to make my holiday wonderful and I thank them again for it.
Ward was really helpful from the beginning. Location is what you are getting here. The view to the ocean is amazing and it's central to everything in manly.
Excellent studio apartment to stay in.

Joanna and Ali's place is nicely located in the CBD and close to anything you need. The home is neatly kept and well presented. My interstate guest enjoyed the stay and any issue that came up was quickly looked after.
Great location! I was here for 3 weeks and it was close to beach and public transport. Perfect apartment
Great place for a family group to stay. Pool & spa with great outdoor deck area.
The host canceled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice cosy apartment style home close to ships and transport

Our stay at Leanne's Queenscliff apartment was perfect from the outset. Leanne greeted us upon arrival at the apartment, giving us a quick tour of the space and building facilities. After a long international flight it was a lovely warm welcome. The apartment was extremely clean, modern and well appointed, perfect for two people with plenty of space for suitcases. It is located in a new, secure building within easy walking distance to Freshwater and Manly beach, shops and restaurants. There is a bus stop right outside the apartment building, and only a 15 minute walk to the Manly ferry.
Leanne had kindly left us some pantry, fridge and bathroom supplies to get us started, we couldn't have asked for anything more! We spent many lovely evenings on the spacious balcony, enjoying the view of the garden looking out to the Manly lagoon.
Communicating with Leanne was easy prior to arrival, and she was always available for any questions during our stay. 
We highly recommend a stay at Leanne's beachside apartment. Thanks Leanne, we thoroughly enjoyed it!
Nice, clean place. Nicole is great at communicating.  Central location

We stayed at Aquila House over Xmas and NY in 2013 and had a spectacular time.  The house is stylish and simple, with impressive water views and only a short walk to the beach.  It managed to take 2 adults + 2 children + various other family members and friends with kids for BBQs without seeming crowded.  My sons were amazed to hear kookaburras and have a couple of parakeets come down to join us on the terrace at breakfast.  Susie the owner was very straightforward to deal with and added some really thoughtful touches to welcome us (Xmas tree, hamper, list of best cafés and restaurants in the village).  Just be aware that you should rent a car to get around, same need if you stay anywhere  outside of the very centre of Sydney to be honest.  I highly recommend Aquila House for a genuine summer break.

Louise is a phenomenal, warm, helpful and responsive host! Her home was a gorgeous and artfully styled oasis mere minutes from the CBD. I loved every aspect of this stay and highly recommend for those who want a retreat during a business trip or weekend get away - 5 Stars and Thank You Louise!

The rooms are quite dark and not very pretty, but for this price - including a very good breakfast at Cafe Decolata - it's a good offer.
Recommended for budget travelers who don't care about a fancy room and like free breakfast.
The host canceled this reservation 84 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Cute little apartment, with a great lounge room to relax in after a long day exploring the city.  Very beautifully decorated. Extremely close to transport links and in easy walking distance to many tourist locations, as well as great bars and restaurants nearby. Everything you could want in a little Sydney apartment!

What a lovely, lovely older home . The private enclosed deck allows you to open the bedroom doors , fall asleep and wake to the sounds of crashing waves and native birds on beautiful Tamarama beach . The house is atmospheric, bright light and welcoming with its large entertaining spaces and roomy galley kitchen. Lovely touches were added with a few footballs my son was able to enjoy. 
I regularly use Airbnb, I’d definitely recommend this home , it’s been one of our favorites.

Lilian made the stay lovely, the place was extremely clean. Lilian went out of her way to organise an iron when I needed one which was a huge help. She also wrote me a lovely list of places to eat around the location and they were awesome suggestions!

We spend a great time at Austin’s house. He is a really friendly,  always helpful and great host we received always a promptly answers when we had questions. The house is very pretty we enjoyed a pool, a wonderful open kitchen, a beautiful barbecue area everything is very clean. The house is close to the city just a short walk to the train and 20min drive. We would absolutely recommend this room and would come back if we are visiting Sydney again. 
Lisa & Timon

Great stylish place!
Would definitely come again.

Excellent communications with Mona, however we didn't need much as everything in the accomodation was provided and perfect

Karen is a wonderful host.
I really enjoyed her place and her company. Her place is clean comfortable and close to all (2 min walk to the beach)
Karen guided me through all my stay and thanks to her my 4 days visit was a filled up with the right activities.
Thanks you karen for being such a great host I hope one day to come back.
If you stay in this apartment and feel that it is not up to the standard you are expecting then you are the type of person who expects to buy a Rolls Royce for BMW money.
The place is super enough, bus rides right at doorstep, amazing urban living pad with selective European cafes just a few footsteps away. Great service and feels saturated for Sydney touring.
Very happy with the house, beautifully decorated and very spacious. Only issue was there was no wifi.
This family was wonderful. They shared there beautiful home with us. Had great amenities and very accommodating. Excellent response time.  Thanks Karan and family!
What wonderful hosts! The house is very clean an organized. Newtown is a great place to explore and being so close to the train and buses, we weren't far from anything. Five stars!
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La casa está excelentemente equipada y si uno quiere estar cerca de Sydney (40 minutos en auto) pero en un lugar tranquilo es inmejorable. La mejor playa para mi gusto (Palm Beach) está solo a 10 minutos. Sin dudas un lugar de elite..

Kirrilly was very welcoming from the moment I booked the stay. She made it super easy to pick up the keys and find the flat and then she left us tea, coffee, chocolate and milk and bread plus extras in the fridge. The apartment was compact but cute - a good size for a couple to stay and we were completely at home and relaxed there. It's clean and bright with all mod cons and very reasonably priced for the fabulous location.
Mosman is a bit of a hidden gem of Sydney - one of the most beautiful and fancy spots yet so convenient and with not to much tourist traffic. The flat is right near Mosman shops and there are buses straight into town or down to Manly.
Best of all you can walk down the hill and find yourself at gorgeous Balmoral beach. We had hot chips down there every other day and strolled around, even going for a few early summer swims. Glorious!
Do yourself a favour and stay at Kirrilly's.
We had a lovely stay here - just one night. Quiet, relaxing, a lovely second floor room and picturesque backyard.

A really nice place. We enjoyed our stay and Samanthas room was modern, clean and had a really comfortable bed. Samantha was a great host although she was travelling at the same time she did her best to stay in touch. We also received towels, shampoo, body wash and a sponge at the welcome, which was awesome. Beside this Samantha has two really cool housemates who are friendly and helpful. The busses and trains are in a walking distance of 10 minutes which takes you to the CBD, although the famous beaches as Manly and Bondi will take you more than one hour with public transport. I would highly recommend this place.

If your looking for a place to fully relax, hear the sea from the comfort of your bed or get up early and see the sunrise on the beach. Then this is the place for you. We had a lovely couple of days and Anne was a great host and gave us loads of lovely treats for our stay. My little boy loved playing with the toys and we loved the peace and quite.

This was a great house in a very cool area. It is in a super convenient location - trains and buses, grocery stores, cafes and restaurants all within 2 minutes walk from the house. The house is new and tidy, and full of plants and colour - it was a really nice atmosphere. The host was very helpful and made sure I had everything I needed, she even left me a little gift! The housemates were also really nice, they were friendly but did their own thing mainly, and that was fine with me. Overall an excellent airbnb experience. I would totally recommend it.

The house is really wonderful. We were warmly welcomed and got a delicious apple strudel - a great start after arriving on a long flight from Europe. The garden is a small green paradise. Walk into Manly is roughly 20 min. We highly appreciated our stay and would love to come back.
Excellent location to great cafe and restaurants.  Apartment is very modern and comfortable.  Excellent hosts.
Really clean, nice and luminous flat, central, you can do everything by walking

Imran was friendly and hospitable, and I slept very well in the bed in the large room.  The apartment is very close to North Sydney station which so convenient and wonderful when travelling to things in Sydney.  The room is also great value. The apartment has simple decor and is in an old block of flats, but the other benefits more than make up for it. Thanks Imran !

This was a great space. The host was responsive, friendly and extremely hospitable. A short walk to places like Dan Murphy's, cafes and lots of cheap and cheerful restaurants. Close to public transport (30 minutes from CBD), and 15 minutes by Uber to CBD, Newtown and most of the iconic beaches (Bondi, Coogee etc.) The dogs also had a blast! Great value for money. Would definitely stay here again!

A great and private place close to everything you need for a relaxing stay in beautiful Manley 
Extremely welcoming and helpful with local tips.
i think you should wait on this place until Ilhwan gets it into shape.

The rental lives up to its pictures.
Brand new, spacious and well equipped.
Very responsive host. Conveniently situated. Good value in an expensive city.
Nothing less than 5 stars!
The apartment was great, exactly as advertised. Oriel was fantastic, everything was super easy. Highly recommend, 11/10.

Fantastic, stylish apartment, in a top, easily accessible location. The photos say it all; everything was to a very high standard, super comfortable bed, we also used the deluxe air mattress (think I'll buy one myself). Paul was extremely accommodating, met us at the door and showed us around the apartment. Loved the guest guide with many suggestions that we followed, including shopping, walks, the best spot to get a coffee and amazing restaurants. Luke and Paul really know the best of Potts Point. They have certainly created a wonderful oasis for all to stay in. We'll certainly be staying there again.

David was a very accommodating and welcoming host! The place had a fantastic view as promised on the description and the bedroom was nicely set up for my arrival. I had a great stay and would recommend David's place for anyone looking to stay in the vicinity of the Eastern Suburb beaches or the university.

We had a great stay here. Hayley was very easy to communicate with prior to our arrival. The room was spotless and comfortable and the breakfast/coffee was very much appreciated. The central location was perfect for our weekend in the city.

Bronwyn met us at the time mutually agreed to show us around the house. she was really friendly. We were emailed a house manual which had details one would require. The neighbourhood was quiet and we enjoyed the proximity to city and the convenience to coffee shops and bars. Would definitely recommend this place to our friends.
Great location! Jonathen was always nice.

I was thoroughly disappointed in this apartment, on arrival we were told we had been moved to a different room. 
The Room we received had no view, no oven, no dryer, the bathroom was disgusting and had to be cleaned by us on arrival.
The walls were covered in marks, we paid for a queen bed, sofa bed and a single bed, however we recieved a double and two singles. 
The Room key didn't even have the correct room number on it, the fridge had milk stains and none of the cutlery matched..
The wine in the room was a nice touch and it was in a great location..

Helen & Mike are the perfect host. Their home is beautiful, their company fantastic and the overall service is the best I have received in Australia outside of a hotel setting. I honestly can not recommend them higher, they really are great people! Thanks so much, Tom.

When we first arrived Leslie and Roy made us feel very welcome, explaining everything in detail so we had a really relaxed and smooth stay without any issues. Excellent access to the beach and local shops, highly recommended.

Great service. Would recommend this place to anyone in a heart beat. 
A++++ host. 
Quick to reply to messages
Beautiful clean home and in an excellent spot. Host was very quick to respond and helpful. Would recommend this place.
Kelly is a great host! Really friendly and helpful!

Location was perfect! Very close to train station and many restaurants and shops. Communication with Freya was good she always replied to my messages very quickly. Place is very alternative, always full of different people but also good for relax. The only thing I didn't like was cleanliness of the house. But if I had a chance I would book it back!

Imogene's flat was perfect for our stay. Within walking distance to shops, good coffee, and the beach. It was quiet, the bed comfortable with lovely white sheets and tidy and clean. Imogene was helpful and accomodating with our booking.

My boyfriend and I were greeted by Angela and Geoff upon arrival and taken to the ground level of their private home  - their place looks just like the pictures!! What a great way to spend a mini weekend getaway. Angela and Geoff are so warm and welcoming and make you feel right at home from the moment we met them. Great place to stay in Palm beach, highly recommend their beautiful home! Couldn't get any better than this
Very nice place to stay at :)
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

My production company booked Jason's home to shoot the second series of our online show, A Shared House and we had an incredible time.

In the months leading up to our booking Jason made himself available to assist us with any questions or queries we had about our time in the house.

Jason was flexible with our schedule and did everything he could to make our stay as perfect and problem free as it could be.
The home is immaculately kept and in great condition.  Close to public transport and near by shops. 

By the end of the two weeks, Jason's home felt like home to our cast and crew. Both Jason and his partner are so welcoming and accomodating - We have now become great friends!!
Nice place, very neat in a great location, Eric is respectful, great company and makes you feel at home. It was a pleasure to stay here.

Rochelle was excellent from the very beginning till the end! She was quick to reply, and very flexible in arranging to meet us when we first arrive. 

The apartment was lovely and looked exactly the same as the pictures on the listing. It was very neat, clean and spacious. It is in a fantastic location, with yummy Black Star Pastry just around the corner. The apartment block is very quiet and private.  We rented a car during our stay , and the private car space was a great thing to have! 

I left some of my clothing there accidentally (silly me!) and Rochelle was nice enough to offer to post it back to me. I would highly recommend Rochelle's apartment to everyone!

I really enjoyed the stay. Yasmin is very easy going, thoughtful and friendly. She prepared us some chocolate and wine as it was my boyfriends birthday.  
The house is amazin with grate design. Walking distance to bus to the city. Our room is very comfy with ensuite and aircon. Definitely recommend!

Great location, great hosts, great apartment. I have nothing less to say than simply great!! about my pleasent stay and warm hospitality by a lovely couple. 
Thank you
The apartment is small but in a great location. Good value.
Greg is so helpful all through our stay. They are how the perfect hosts should be.

This apartment is absolutely exquisite. The fittings and furnishings are very high quality and comfortable.  The place is like a beautiful parisian retreat.  The location is close to great cafes, shops and Centennial Park, 10 mins from city and beaches.  It truly is a home away from home.  We are originally from Sydney so we know our areas which is why we chose to stay here.  We used to always stay in hotels but NOW we will endeavour to stay here whenever we come to Sydney.  Louise was wonderful, extremely helpful and timely with all our questions.

Solange were absent for our staying but their Argentina'housemates were nice. 
Good place to walk near to oxford street with good cafe and restaurants.
We enjoyed our stay in Sydney

Cleanliness of the bathroom was a major concern for us but the bedroom was very clean and is a huge room.  The bed is very firm, but that may suit some guests staying.  Fei is absolutely delightful and a very interesting man who we did enjoy meeting.

We have just returned from our trip to Australia and our stay at Beacon Hill. From the moment we entered the property we knew we had found our home for 3 weeks. The house had been carefully prepared to make us feel that we were not intruding but feel at home. All spaces were organised clean and of a very high standard. Communication with Mari has always been fast and informative. Our stay in Mari and James home has been a pure pleasure and we are so happy that we had the opportunity to share in their home. We had full access to all the house which made our stay comfortable and relaxed. 
The outside space for entertaining was excellent and the beds, linen towels and use of washing machine, dishwasher etc made for a very comfortable sleep and stay. We have 2 teenage sons so the extra space the house gave was very important for our trip as were spending quality time with our sister who lives in the northern beaches.
We were met by Mari 's mother who was so very welcoming and there was no problems at all during our stay. We would all recommend this home as a choice on AIRBNB
WITH REGARDS JO AND PAUL STEVENS

What a great apartment! Absolute beach front. Amazing views.  Open plan, light, bright with a great designer feel thanks to gorgeous furniture and a wonderful art collection.

Mal was fantastic. Very welcoming and helpful. Going above and beyond expectations by dropping in a great DVD collection! Very thoughtful. The vase of gorgeous fresh flowers was a lovely touch also.

Bondi is now a mecca for some seriously great restaurants, groovy little bars and some of Sydney's best coffee. We were spoiled for choice.

We loved our stay here and will most definitely be back. Thanks Mal!

Jared & Diana are 2 very welcoming and kind hosts , they let me book their place on the last minute and was very helpful with the process, they also checked up via SMS as this was my method of contact on anything else we needed on a regular .
Their place has absolutely everything all amenities and lots of extras  that makes a comfortable holiday , very good neighborhood as there's a Shopping Mall and  Supermarkets within 1 minute walk .
Would definitely be recommending friends and will be going back for a second time .
Nice & clean, great location with easy walking access to the city, harbour & train station. Thanks again.

Lovely, homey little place. Beautiful location. You can see the water from the front door. 

We really enjoyed our short stay. Jenny the host was very friendly and helpful but left us to do our thing which we liked.

The bed is super comfy too. 

(Also thanks for breakfast Jenny! )

Loved it! Clean, great location and quiet. Great apartment, everything there you need. 

Mags easy to contact if needed and quick to respond. Highly recommended.

We stayed in Isabelle's apartment for one month. We found Isabelle hospitable and thoughtful. Her beautiful studio was so clean and we enjoyed its amazing sunlight, great view and location (close to open spaces, CBD, cafes and restaurants). In short, this experience increased our expectations regarding a place to stay in Sydney!

The apartment is in a great location if you have business or pleasure in the Sydney Olympic Park. Good access to the ferry as well. Vicky as a host was very communicative and Accomodation was extremely clean and tidy. Definitely recommended, especially to business travelers.

Paul and Dianne offer a wonderful cosy cottage . I was so close to everything Balmain has to offer yet the location of the cottage was so quiet and peaceful. This was really a home away from home . 
Paul and Dianne where very welcoming and readily available if needed . The home was clean and very comfortable. 
I will definitely make this my first option each and every time. 
Thanks Paul and Dianne it was a pleasure to meet . 
Regards Nicole

Our crew stayed here for a business trip for Supanova Popculture event. It was great, spacious and walking distance to everything. Parking was a breeze, restaurants around the area and a convenience store. You even get 10% off at the restaurants when you mention your a resident.

I had a fantastic stay in North Bondi thanks to Lucy. The room is lovely, with the sound of birds outside the big window and lots of space around the flat too. Lucy's home is beautifully decorated and clean, and located perfectly on the quiet streets of North Bondi, but still a moments walk  away from the beach and a couple of shops. Lucy is wonderful, so welcoming and even offered to cook me breakfast; amazing host!!
非常好
Had a pleasant stay at this apartment. Did not get to meet Annie personally but she was easily contactable and was very helpful with any questions or enquiries. Overall a good experience.

This is a very clean, airy and comfortable place to stay in what is arguably Sydney's best area. The hosts, Yvonne and Cary, are very welcoming and convivial yet respectful of privacy. The house is modern with all mod cons. The large bedroom (with very comfy bed) is on the ground floor with a good deal of private space in which to relax. There's even a saltwater swimming pool in the back garden! The location is great for getting to the best of the city's beaches and Eastern Suburbs, with Bondi just 15 minutes walk and Rose Bay about 20. The nearest bus stop is just 5 minutes away. From here you can easily reach Bondi Junction, the city and beyond. 
This is a quiet area, with the nearest shops and bars 10 - 15 minutes walk away, so maybe not an ideal place for the party animal.
As far as I'm concerned, after 7 weeks staying here, this place is perfect. My only negative is that any B&B from now on will be a compromise.

Location was brilliant, parking easy, undercover and secure. The balcony is large. We really could have used an air-con during our stay and the place does not have one. It has 2 portable fans, but that was not enough to beat Sydney's summer heat. For everything else the place was OK.

I would happily live in this apartment as it is. The view is spectacular and the apartment is very comfortable with a very well equiped kitchen good internet and all the comforts of home including a nice bed. I love this location, close to the train and direct access to the city but in a lovely neighbourhood again with unbeatable views of the harbour. Everything is good quality and the inclusions well thought out to make things easy for your stay. I have rented Airbnb properties all over the world, this is one of the first ones that I sent links to my friends. You won't be disappointed.

We had a great stay at George's place. He was very prompt in his responses. Loved his tips for good restaurants and bars in the neighbourhood. The apt is very cosy, clean and comfortable. It's perfectly located in the central with easy access to the metro. Total value for money.

Tam was the most attentive, considerate and friendly host. The introduction was very comprehensive but also informative and friendly. Tam responds to all questions very quickly. The apartment itself is in an amazingly convenient location and although cosy, is very modern and beautifully decorated.

We stayed here for several weeks during a gap between leases. This is a lovely quiet apartment situated close to public transport (buses and ferries) connecting you to the city. The apartment was clean and spacious with all mod cons available. Julia was excellent to deal with, and was very responsive to any queries that we had.

I'd recommend this apartment to anyone looking to stay in Sydney.

The room and bathroom were very clean and nicely decorated. It’s a very pretty area, close to plenty of bus stops and shops. 
Sam was very kind and helpful, I would’ve loved to get the chance to meet in person. Would definitely recommend!

Thanks Philip for providing a really nice design house in a convenient location, we do have a great time. The host is nice and always helpful. The location is really close to CBD and any public transportation. Highly recommend to friends who travel to Sydney with a group of people.

Well,
I felt very comfortable in my room and the 
living area "warmly atmosphere ".  Karen is a really pretty person she's always up for a friendly conversation ready and gives good tips for everything! 
The location is perfect, close the City and to the beaches:) 
I'll never forget the time with Karen here, and can only recommend this accommodation. Peace & love Florian
It’s wonderful place. Very close to station
We had a great stay at Tracey's studio. It was very clean and comfortable with everything we needed. Tracey was responsive and gave us good instructions to find the place. Would definitely recommend.

Only stay here for one night but wanted to stay longer. Arriving late on Thursday night, we were warmly welcome by the host couple. Daniel and Elena were super hosts I've ever had as they fulfilled beyond our needs, so friendly and generous couple. We were invited to have a late meal with them too and apparently Daniel is a professional chef because the food was just amazing. Thank you isn't enough for these wonderful hosts. A truly enjoyable night. We will surely be back.
Awesome

Nida’s place was great for my 7 days in Sydney. It was really clean, 10 mins away from the train station and 5mins to the nearest mall (Target/KMart for shopping, Coles/Woolworth for groceries and the mall also has its own foodcourt and restaurants). Nida also was very accomodating and made us feel at home. We managed to really enjoy our stay in Sydney because of her! Her home was actually one of the memorable parts of sydney because of how comfortable we were staying at her place! Highly recommended and thanks again Nida!
Nice little apartment half an hour away from Sydney. It's a good place to stay at if you're in Sydney for longer, but wouldn't recommend it for a shorter time.

Would recommend this stay to everyone, very clean stay, Jessie and James are very kind and helpful. We could use the public transport cards and a 4G card of them, They picked us up at the AirPort, put water and eggs in our fridge,.. Good bus and train connections to Sydney and to Macquarie University. Very nice stay, everything you need is there. Thank you Jessie and James!

I stayed at this place for 7 days. The description on the website is accurate and the location is superb. The only criticism is because the property is the owners family residence there was virtually no space to unpack a suitcase so we ended up using the kitchen table. Otherwise I was quite pleased with the apartment.
Kasey was a fantastic host with great communication. Her apartment is beautiful with so many cozy touches. Her place is right in the heart of Bondi with everything you need right outside the door!

I would definitely recommend this to everyone who still has doubts and is looking through the reviews. There are so many good experiences that I don’t even know where to start. But let’s start with Charles, he is super accommodating and friendly. The communication with Charles is very warm and efficient, and he is also a responsible host who really cares. And the location of the house is very convenient. It’s close to everything I need plus, so many good restaurants and pubs  which I don’t really need during weekdays, but if you are a foodie, then......The house itself is clean, tidy and comfortable to stay at. I would say it feels like home, apart from my home is never this clean... All in all, I would come back again if I have the opportunity.
Nice room at a good price. OK for getting your head down at night and getting sone rest. Host sounded very friendly through communication.

We had a fabulous time at Studio Bimbadeen. Stunning location by the river, very tranquil and relaxing. 
Shirley and her husband were lovely and very hospitable and their little dog was so sweet. 
We will definitely be coming back here.

Our stay in Manly was really great, the location of the apartment was ideal, just across the street from the beach. The apartment is perfect for the location with great space and a homely feel. Would definitely recommend.
The hosting was great with awesome local tips.

Mariana was a great host.She was kind,warm, and always helpful.
I had a great 3 month stay at Mariana's (Website hidden by Airbnb) location,it was clean,well equipped,everything was well prepared.And clean big bathtub,I was enjoyed every bath time.

For a girls weekend away we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Hilde was very welcoming and obviously takes a lot of pride in providing a place that is comfortable, inviting and clean. She has great attention to detail, the house had everything we needed, good aircon for the summer and a well set up kitchen which made cooking a BBQ easy. Hilde provided us with a lovely breakfast with delicious home made bread, jams, muesli and tea and coffee. The house is in a great location within easy walking distance from the beach and shops. 
Thanks very much for having us Hilde!

Anita is a pleaser. She will do all she can to make your stay in her perfectly situated flat on bondi beach. If you search for a spot in Bondi, here it is ! Highly recommanded
We really enjoyed our time here. The house is absolutely amazing; the host friendly and informative and the location was superb. Thanks to Niki and family.

A very well kept house in birchgrove and only a few minutes walk to buses into the city or a slightly longer walk to the ferry. The check in and out process was managed really well. Good size with a nice courtyard space. A pleasure to stay there.

Friendly, helpful and welcoming hosts. Beautiful and comfortable apartment. Located opposite beautiful Hyde Park and close to Sydney's main attractions and public transport. We enjoyed having Sydney on our doorstep and exploring the city. Can't wait to visit again! Thank you Desiree and Julian.

My partner and I had a wonderful stay at Pittwater Paradise. The accommodation was spotless and we were delighted to receive a welcome gift from Evelyn consisting of  wine, fruit and muffins. The kitchen was stocked with essential items such as milk, juice, tea, coffee, butter – really a nice touch. The view over Pittwater was lovely and relaxing, and the proximity to shops, beaches etc was fantastic. Evelyn was a wonderful host and more than happy to suggest dining options and other activities to do whilst on the northern beaches;  the house manual was also very informative.  We really had the best time and hope to return one day!
Great place, we will definitely stay there again.
Felicity was communicative and pleasant, the room was clean, quiet and comfortable. I would recommend to other guests.
Spacious accommodations in a perfect location to get to know Bondi. Would be thrilled to stay here again.

Un super séjour chez Wyatt ! Le quartier est très sympa et a toute les commodités, l'accès au centre ville est simple et rapide ! Et Wyatt est toujours de bon conseil pour les visites à effectuer à Sydney !

The location of this property was central to transport - an easy train ride in from the airport and short walk from museum station

The property was nothing special - served its purpose - wouldn't rush back in a hurry - hosts could do a lot more to make the property more accommodating for business guests

Mark amd Sarah are a lovely couple with a lot of tips for you about how to get the best around in sydney and what are nice places to go

He's so kind and helps us have a good time here. The room is clean and roommates are also friendly and helpful whatever you ask. I'm glad to stay here!

The location is amazing. Right off the Harbour, and close to a lot of restaurants. The building is also nice with a pool and hot tub. The amazing kids playground at darling quarter is one kt a km away. The apartment is spacious and clean. Great host and very quick to respond. Highly recommended.

We only booked the apartment a few days before, and it was my first time dealing with airbnb, so we really appreciated the quick responses.  Also, we had a bottle of champagne and chocolates on arrival which was a lovely surprise!
I would highly recommend this apartment.  It is the perfect place for people who want to hang out, relax and and enjoy one of Sydney's premier beach locations.  
I will definitely go back if I need a place in Sydney.

We had a Fantastic stay at Georgia appartement that was very well furniture and lot of space and great kitchen.

The place is also quite and you are just wake up by birds.

The location is perfect in the middle of COOGEE, with walking distance to beach and randwick for shopping and great cafes.

Georgia is a great host and we'r looking forward to visit again.
