Very modern, one year old, two story house. Tota and family are great hosts always attentive and helpful to our needs. Room with private bathroom was fantastic. Very neat clean, tidy and very spacious with lots of room and great open planning. Recommended as a very good airbnb house and hosts.

It's my first time to rent house on Airbnb . Fortunately , I choose Willyan's house . Willyan is very friendly people . It's very tidy and clean . If you like surfing , you can't miss this house , just walk 1 min than you can arrive beach , everynight you can hear sea sound from beach , it's very comfortable .
Great location and a great appartment in general. Places like these are why I prefer AirBnb above hotels.

We really enjoyed staying with Kath,  the place was great and really clean and tidy. Also really central and close to supermarkets and redfern train station. The fridge in the room was a lovely touch, as were the welcome biscuits! :)

I had a great stay at 'the mews'. It's a brilliant location surrounded by some of Sydney's best foodie haunts. 

The cow and moon (coffee and ice cream) as well as the stinking bishops (cheese and wine) both deserve a special mention 

Narelle was great to deal with and everything was as described

A perfect hideaway tucked in a laneway of leafy Paddington. A perfect spot to relocate whilst we were renovating our kitchen with a hop, skip & a jump to my favourite shopping hub of Glenmore Road as well as the delicious Jackie's. The 3 bedroom cottage looks so pretty from the outside and beautifully furnished & styled on the inside, it made me pine to move back to Paddington.

Awesome place! 
Host was very friendly, loved the room set up. 
Overall positive experience, would highly recommend
Lovely and friendly people, close to National Park. Great communication.
Marcelle is very nice. The house is very good because it is near the beach. The house is very suitable to a big family.
Fantastic location, incredible views, and very comfortable accomodation for a short or long stay break.

Great place to stay, everything worked smoothly with key pick-up and good communication. It's a quiet street so a good night's sleep, yet just a short walk to some great places for breakfast. Really convenient for getting everywhere with the train station just 5 mins away too.
This place is very well located in Bondi. Suits for 4 peoples easy, good value for money. Cassandra is very communicative and will provide what you need. I definitely recommend this place.

The location was perfect for our needs and the apartment was quiet.  The check in did not go well as we weren't told which apartment it was and the key had to be collected from another location over 1km away which we didn't know either until we got there, and had sent the uber off.  The listing says there is a key safe but they didn't use it for us.  The host wasn't contactable either despite calling the 24 hr number a couple of times and leaving messages, so the whole process took about an hour and a half.  The apartment is tiny and is more of a bedsit rather than having a separate bedroom.  This also made me wonder about the very expensive $170 cleaning fee.

Perfect location with quite neighborhood also convenience to heart of city, airly living area and comfy room where I got quite nice rest.
Sarah is a considering host and easy to communicate, I had a great stay here!  Definitely recommend to people who like to have pravicy and also explore Sydney!

Jonny was a really nice and kind host and everything was as expected. We enjoyed staying there and if we'll return to Manly one day, I won't hesitate with booking his accommodation again. Highly recommended!
Compact, well-appointed and equipped flat in top location, near public transport and shops. Eleanor is a very responsive and helpful host too.

We absolutely loved staying at The Cov. The house was delightful, full of character, clean and equipped with everything we could need. Communication from Joy was excellent and the location of the house was perfect for us. We highly recommend staying at this place and we'll be back for sure, we hope. Joy was also hugely helpful when I left my earrings behind. She went out of her way to make sure I had them before we were on the road again.
Angela was very friendly and welcoming, I had a wonderful stay in her warm house, couldn't have asked for more. Thanks Angela
I loved the apartment, the location is perfect, and Valentine & Jack has been very good hosts. Highly recommended!

You can tell Julia is a superhost because of her attention to details. From small welcome cards to simple but carefully selected breakfast products.
The location is great, just a quick walk away from Kings Cross station. Great appliances make the stay very comfortable and I thoroughly enjoyed the selection of teas and coffees offered.
The apartment itself is very "hygge", a term we learned reading one of the books available. It's very cozy and the decoration along with the lightning is beautiful.
Not only we stay here again but easily see ourselves living there.
Thanks Julia!
Ive was a lovely host who made us feel very welcome

Nice location, host where amazing and very forth coming on messages back and forth with us during the whole stay. Good overall and recommend it because it was a nice apartment with good security to get in and also had the necessary stuff you needed.
Jennifer's apartment was very clean and has amazing views! I think it's one of the best airbnb apartments I've stayed in.
Great central spot. Short walk to the fish markets, Casino and Darling Harbour. Everything is at your doorstep.

Debbie and David have a beautiful house which we enjoyed thoroughly while visiting Sydney.  Plenty of space, fantastic kitchen and lovely pool and garden area for barbecues.  Very close to Manly for ferry trips to Sydney, but Manly itself was a big hit with us.  Definitely best beach according to our girls.  We can't recommend this house highly enough and will definitely be back. Thank you to both.  Great hosts!!

Shawn is a great host, he did everything to make our stay confortable and gave us some really nice places to go visit. 
The room is very cosy and just 5 minutes from the ferry wharf to get you to the city center. 
We had a lovely stay there and would definitely go back :)
the place was perfect and very clean, and value for money. The host is very polite and very helpful. i will recommend it to anyone

Absolutely loved our stay at Jan & Ella's place! Such a lovely house, a lot bigger then expected which was good because most places are a lot smaller and can start to feel really squishy and hot after a few days especially in summer. Location was great, short stroll to the train station, cafes & shops and super close to the city. Everything we needed (and more!) was provided to ensure we had the most comfortable stay. Thank you guys for all the helpful tips and great communication - such great hosts and I definitely recommend you to anyone!

A tidy, modern apartment in a very convenient spot in Neutral Bay, close to shops, banks, a post office and several restaurants and cafes. We enjoyed our stay very much and would have loved to stay longer.

The place is beautiful. The room is big, the bed really comfortable and you even have Manly Harbor views when the weather is nice. 

Jackie and Martin are honestly some of the nicest and friendliest people I've ever met. They were super welcoming and nice and if you want to know any cool places that you can visit don't hesitate to ask, they know a lot about Sydney and Australia in general. I'll definitely be back at their place.

A lovely place to stay. Perfect for a family.
Just around the corner from everything.
The home was better than described. As you envisaged there was competition for the hammock. 
Thanks Emma & family for letting us stay in your home.
John, Pam, Matt & Josie.
Overall a great stay! Central location made it easy to get everywhere. Unfortunately it was quite loud from neighboring streets and rooms

Gracious home and hosts. Spacious, private and very comfortable attic room - would definitely recommend to others. Casey and Larry were welcoming and easy to communicate with. Location was close to parklands, harbour and great cafes. Thanks very much Casey.
Great! Definitely we will back!

The apartment was in such a fantastic location! Easy to join the Bondi to Coogee coastal walk and what an amazing walk it is! 
Loved sitting out on the 'generous' balcony and enjoying the view down to Tamarama Beach SLSC. 
Thank you so much Ruby for this little 'oasis' in a beautiful part of the world!
Wonderful host Mohit is :) i would highly recommend him. You won't be disappointed and the apartment was very good :) looking forward to my next visit!

This was my first time booking a property on (Hidden by Airbnb) and after staying at Dee Why Vista, it definitely will not be my last!  I absolutely adored the apartment, it is in such a perfect location and so family friendly.  We booked a last minute trip to Sydney to visit some friends who live in the Northern Beaches and are so glad we booked this apartment.  My kids loved all the toys and being able to run downstairs and play at the park that is right next to the apartment.  It was wonderful to have such a short walk to the beach and most of our time was spent here.  The kitchen is extremely well stocked and we really enjoyed being able to use the BBQ and spend time out on the balcony.  The local’s guide was really useful in planning our trip and our communication with the host was fast, easy and reliable.  I highly recommend this apartment and can’t wait to stay again.

I had such a lovely stay at Jake's place. It was only a short visit but Jake was so accommodating throughout my stay. He was flexible with check in times and made sure he was home to let me in. The apartment is STUNNING. Light filled clean apartment by the water, short walk to see the harbour bridge along the bay. Very spacious room with large wardrobe, desk and fan (summer in Sydney!)  Kitchen has everything you need, very clean and stylish bathroom too. The street comes off Glebe point road so while very quiet and peaceful you are only a short walk from cafes, bars, transport options and supermarkets. Would definitely stay again and recommend to other airbnb users. Thank you Jake!!
Absolutely perfect. Margaret and John are lovely and made the stay even more memorable. Thanks so much.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Agnes was a great and very friendly host. The apartment was nice and comfortable, and had a perfect location in Redfern.
Very happy with my stay here. Tracy was really friendly and everything went smoothly. It's a great little place in a fantastic spot. The lake is sublime. Highly recommended.

The apartment was neat and tidy. Very close to transport and good location of you're working in the CBD. The check in procedure was very flexible and Angela was very easy to get in touch with and followed up. She even left me a box of chocolates as a warm welcome. Will stay again.

The location is very nice. Every morning I can wake up by a very nice water-front view! All the furniture and facilities are luxury and perfect. We had a very nice New Year holiday in this house. Ben is a very nice guy, he help us a lot and gave us many trip advises in Sydney. There is a complimentary parking space, and if you wanna walk or take public transport, it's always very convenience. I think whether you are alone or with families, the apartment is always a best choice!

Super clean house, very easy to find, neighborhood is quite, fast wifi, host is responsible and accurate.
In winter the place is very cold.

Trent is a really nice guy who will help you in any way he can.
When we arrived the place was a bit dirty but that wasn't Trents fault because he had been awayand his apartment had been out for lease.
And he made a really good job with fixing everything so we could have a happy stay!
And we did:)

The location is great and the apartment is lovely:)
The room is pretty small but it didn't bother us at all.

Can recommend this place to anyone, close to Bondi and to small hidden beautiful beaches around the coastline.

Stor och trivsam lägenhet. Dock störande oljud från ventilationen i fastigheten nattetid. Trevligt område med flera restauranger och pubar i närheten. Enkelt att ta sig de centrala delarna av Sydney till fots.
Good location. Good if you just want someone to sleep.
很好很干净,位置不错,距离eastwood及MQ uni都很近,值得推荐

The White House is a fabulous, chic terrace within walking distance to great restaurants, exclusive shopping as well as so many other culturally enriched experiences. 

Kerry and Adam were the perfect hosts. They met us upon arrival - which made the entry etc effortless. 

The kids loved the outside area - the backyard was a heaven-send considering you’re only 5 mins to the CBD. 

I would recommend to anyone travelling with a family - or who needs to be located close to the CBD for work or an event. 

We will be back soon!!

Fantastic space and location, really nice hosts to ensure the check-in was smooth and stress free. 
Incredible space, great value and I couldn't recommend more highly! 
Thanks Leigh!
Edi was very welcoming to her home.  She was very quick and responsive on taking us in on the very last minute. Thank you for your help.
The rooms were fine but the bathroom and kitchen are very dirty and outdated.
Thank you again for your hospitality and lovely accommodation!

Sharon has a lovely home. It's centrally located with buses nearby. Her home is very well presented and clean with plenty of bedrooms and room to move. As a host she went out of her way to ensure we had everything we needed and was very responsive to any questions (even though she was overseas!). We had a great time and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

Was a pleasure to stay at Matt's house! Really close to the quiet side of King St and the room was everything you could want. Not only that, Matt is a super nice guy and was an excellent host. Matt's dog is beautiful and amazingly cute. Really had a great time and the place comes strongly recommended! For value for money, this is one of best listings in Newtown. Thanks so much for having me! Next time I'm back I would definitely rebook. Stellar!

Tout était parfait, la localisation, la vue, l’appartement décoré avec goût, la ville etc... je recommande sans aucune hésitation cet appartement. De plus Kinga est une hôte très sympathique et arrangeante. J’espère pouvoir y revenir un jour !
Great location, nice host and good looking apartment!

Hong is a lively and wonderful lady. She has a heart of gold. She kept us very comfortable and treated just like her own family. Provided us with the privacy we wanted. The place was wonderful. House was cosy and the room was sparkling clean and bed was very much comfortable.  She also provided us the crib for our toddler. She has a lovely and friendly dog. She went out of the way to provide us comfort. Also she hosted a wonderful New year day lunch for guests. The room also had an AC which was much needed in warm nights of December. Highly recommend to everyone.

Suzie was most welcoming, and our first Airbnb experience couldn't have gone better. The apartment is exquisitely furnished and feels very homey. It's posh yet comfy. The bed (including the bedding) is on par with upper-scale hotels. Suzie gave us a lot of privacy but was readily available to answer any question. The bathroom for our own usage also has the feel of chic hotels, with an assortment of high-end products. The location is great, between Wynward Station and Darling Harbour. The room is next to a road, but soundproofing is good and I slept well even without using ear plugs (Suzie provides high quality ear plugs should you need them). To sum up, my sister and I would go back in a heart beat.

Anita and Peter are fantastic hosts. The apartment was beautifully decorated and immaculate. Beds are exceptionally comfortable. The location in Manly was perfect, you can see the beach from the balcony, less than 10min stroll to the corso, and less than 20min to Manly Wharf. Loved our stay here and wish we could have moved in permanently!
The host canceled this reservation 65 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

“Wow” is probably the best word I can think to describe this incredible place. The photos just don’t do it justice. Finished with impeccable taste, this place is definitely a gem.  Located on the best part of Mackeral beach, and surrounded by wildlife - including a resident wallaby who comes so close you can feed him by hand! The water as crystal clear as Thailand and just a two seconds away, down a very well paved and not too steep path. The views from the house and tree house are beyond breathtaking and the owner is super nice and attentive. Upon arrival he sent a message to see if we got in OK and during the booking phase he responded immediately to our questions. The BBQ is state of the ark (very important!) and the place is totally set up for entertaining with a great coffee machine, two fridges, plenty of cutlery, glasses, plates etc ... . Everything has been thought of, from hats and repellant to hooks to hang out your wet beach towels. We will definitely be back. Everyone who stopped by to visit us while we were there will be booking too, so I just hope we can get in! Thank you Richard. You have created a little slice of heaven.
Perfect private space

Beautiful house, very well presented and clean. Large bedrooms and comfortable living areas. 
Large back verandah was an ideal gathering space for our family weekend, we could eat and sit comfortably out there during the evening.
10 min walk to coffee, cafes etc or hop onto Ferry for further afield.
Highly recommend

Everything was perfect! The couple is very nice and the house is in a perfect spot,very clean and the atmosphere was perfect for the christmas period :)

thank you very much ragazzi!!!:)

The house is in great location. The house is also very clean and tidy and exactly the same as described in the photos. The host is very friendly and easygoing. All the utilities are functioning well. Recommended to those who plan to hang out with friends in a quiet and private house.

This place was perfect for me while I was traveling solo in Sydney. It's close to buses, a bit of a walk to train stations, and close to a supermarket and lots of cafes.

It can be a little loud in the area - mainly birds and dogs which I'm not used to - and you can hear the garage door opening when the car is driven in and out, but it didn't bother me at all. 

Perfect little place for one person.

Besides the location is very convent not only near the city center but also surrounded by 2 Coles market. This is the most fantastic and lovely experience I ever had.
Paul and his family are very good at taking care of their guests, they prepare milk, honey, orange, cereal for us. During the 2 weeks, they just treat us as same as a part of the family, inviting us to their festival dinner, introducing us to their best friends. Every morning they would ask if it was a good sleep. Every evening, they would say good night before we go back to the room. 
If ever I will go back to Sydney again, this would be my only choice. 

这是我在Airbnb中最最满意的一次住宿体验｡
不仅仅这个地理位置很好,去市中心,悉尼歌剧院,门口的公交车直达｡而且周围的配套设施齐全,十分方便｡
Paul一家人待客非常之好,如若对待家人｡一直给我们买牛奶,橙汁,谷物,蜂蜜等等｡尽可能地提供信息帮助我们｡

We had a great time with Jyoti, they were great hosts and went out if their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable in their home. The bedroom and bathroom are very spacious.  Would definitely recommend staying here.
Great spot by the beach.

Tam's place is the ideal family home for a perfect getaway. The location was great to avoid the crowds but close enough to Curl Curl, Freshie and Manly to enjoy the beaches and all that the area has to offer. The pool was a definate draw card and the outdoor area is conducive to rest and relaxation. It's obvious that Tam is a keen cook as everything is thought of and available for entertaining. Would definately recommend and would come back again!

My friends and me had here a perfect time over christmas and NYE!

Jo have a really beautiful and cosy home with 2 bed- and bathrooms, a big balcony with a BBQ and a great view over Brookvale/Manly. 
And she is so helpful and very friendly!

Because Jo was not in town, her awesome mother in law gave us the key. We were allowed to check in at 8am because our bus arrived earlier and we were also allowed to check out later - she is really helpful and straightforward, too! 

The busstation to Sydney CBD is only a few minutes away and the bus takes about 30-45 min.
The wifi is good and Jo has a lot of DVDs for the TV as well. 

The apartment situated on a big hill;  great for views, but tiring with suitcases! ;)

We where thrilled and we can highly recommend this apartment ..we would love to come back one time.

Great experience. Communication from beginning to end with Charles was faultless. Apartment was exactly as advertised. In a convienent location, close to a great cafe and a short stroll to a few good beaches (uphill a slog on the way home!). Flat was clean and tidy and everything worked like it should do. We would fully recommend a stay here.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Doris was great, she was very accommodating with when I could check in (11pm) and she responded to my communications in a timely fashion.  They have a beautiful home that I wish I could have taken advantage of more.
Charlie is an excellent host, great place in an excellent location. Perfect if you want to spend a few night in the city.

Duncan’s place offered the perfect family break for us. It’s very accessible from Sydney but gives the feeling of being far away from it all. The location is great being just a short drive from several beaches, shops, cafes etc. The house is incredibly well equipped with everything you can think of and the host went out of their way to provide helpful information and little touches which made us feel very at home. It’s a very sociable home with several eating and entertaining spots in the house: an upper balcony & bbq overlooking the treetops and ocean as well as a lower deck, dining table and bbq area downstairs. The garden is private and the pool area lovely for lounging around under a shady tree. We would have no hesitation recommending Duncan’s place.

Very good location! The bus stop is just a minute walk from the door. The restaurants and cafes within the area are very, very good! The house is very spacious and Tarah was such a lovely host! I would definitely recommend this location, especially if you are travelling with kids.

We had a great time in Paddington; the house is fascinating and the room was perfect. Sadly we never met Arnie in person, instead were shown around by his easy-going and lovely friend. Paddington Market is just across the road and we walked everywhere along Oxford St. Highly recommended.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great stay at Luise's flat. It was modern and new, very clean and simply we felt like home from home.
Luise is a perfect host and so friendly, she provided us with everything we could need to know in sydney. Highly recommended host and definitely I wish to meet her again once I get Sydney.

Great location, great studio and unique atmosphere with views over the horse race track! I would definitely stay there again. Oliver is a great guy and it was a breeze to communicate with him! I had an awesome stay!
Terry was an awesome host, always making sure we're feeling comfortoable. The appartment is very nice and has everything you need and an amazing view. We had a great stay!
Enjoyed my stay, fantastic location,  excellent host.
Over all is good!

A great comfortable little place right smack bang in the centre of circular quay. Contact with host/s was quick and easy too

Super great location, very close to a range of great restaurants and bars. The apartment is quiet and old worldly but with character and modern comforts. It was the perfect combination of peace and privacy in amongst a bustling area with great nightlife
Shared a stay a the Little Albion for work - great location, spacious and super clean rooms, really lovely atmosphere. All in all a lovely experience. Highly recommended

Had an amazing time in Manly, much credit due to the apartment and it's amazing location. This apartment was tastefully decorated with plenty of wardrobe space so you could unpack and feel at home!! Also, we could not have asked for a better position, we were so central to absolutely everything from cafes to shopping, it had an amazing view of the beach and surrounding areas! Would definitely stay here again! And recommended it to everyone!!!

My stay with Kondrad and Mish was the best experience I had with airbnb! And I seriously believe that it probably won't get  any better than this! When you are looking for a place to stay this is the one! Not only is their place beautiful but it is the people making it very special. I never ever felt more at home in any other place I stayed at. For a change everything that is shown and described is the real deal- which I experienced not always to be true. Konrad and Mish are very nice and kind and made me feel very welcome. They shared not only their home with me but also their knowledge about their beautiful country and let me be part of their lifes. Thank you for having me stay with you and thank you for taking me with you to the event and on the trip exploring in the Blue Mountains National Park! I also enjoyed the walks with your dog! I had a fantastic time and made new friends ;) I am definitely gonna be back!
This modern and clean house is located close to the Blue Mountains and an ideal place to stay for a one day trip. Well-equipped kitchen and big TV.

Our stay was great: good location, great room with good facilities and awesome hosts! There is just a short 5-minute-walk to metro station and the metro takes ca. 15min to Circular Quay. The hosts give you enough time for your own but they are great to have a chat as well.

Our family of 4 had fantastic time staying at Sarah’s stylish place with  harbor view! We could not wish for a better place for New Year’s Eve. 3 minutes walk from the major transport hub, close to the CBD  and Bondi beach. Sarah was a great host who looked after us and made sure we were very comfortable. Super fast communication, clean place, fast WiFi, much more! Thank you Sarah for being our host!  Highly recommended.

Dont think you can ask for more from the host and the accommodation. No excuses here. If you are creative you can make almost anything with the kitchenette. Perfect location
. All the privacy you need and conversation (mostly by text) but the host is always happy to pop in. 
Bed is comfortable and all the netflix ypu can have at your leisure. Go for it!

I stayed at Jenny's apartment in Potts Point for over a month and it was a perfect home away from home.  Jenny was an impeccable host.  So welcoming and accomodating - even when I locked myself out of the house she was around in five minutes to save me!  I loved every minute of my stay at the apartment.  Jenny's beautifully decked out apartment is a newly renovated studio, so compact but with everything you need - including a great kitchen and bathroom.   The location couldn't be better as you are in the heart of Potts Point, which is my favourite Sydney suburb.  My only wish is that I could have stayed longer!

Absolutely brilliant! The space is spotless and the views are priceless. The icing on the cake is the spectacular rooftop terrace with 360 degree views of the city. All this in a lovely area within easy walk to the ferry wharf. I plan to come back as often as possible.
it's really great place for staying in Sydney
It's cozy and quiet place to stay. There's a really good location, close to supermarket and 20 minutes walk from fish market. It's especially suitable for someone who use public transportation.

I didn't meet Alison as she was away, but Adam let me in and explained everything to me. The house is beautifully (and very newly) renovated, the bed was wonderfully comfortable, and I had my own huge bathroom which was very luxurious. The street is quiet but very convenient to everything. All in all, a great bargain and a lovely place to stay - I'll be back!

Staying at Emmy's place was okay, and I would recommend it for the price, which is probably the cheapest you can find around. 
The house, as well as the room, is probably not the greatest, but you're absolutely paying what you get. 

I only had two minor issues:
1) I thought that 'flexible check-in' meant: 'tell me when you arrive and I'll open the door'. It's not like this, at least not in this case. I was arriving at 11PM/midnight and Emmy informed me she couldn't check me in and asked me to find another place where to stay. The problem was I didn't have the possibility to book another room as I was boarding the plane to get to Sydney, and I didn’t want to arrive to a place I didn’t know, late at night, without even knowing where to go to sleep. Luckily Emmy found a solution and I was granted access to the house. I haven’t seen Emmy during my stay, but I saw Patrick, who I think manages the room when she’s not there. They have both been nice and for any issues I encountered they were there to help. The house is a boarding house, so although you’ll have a private room, you’ll be sharing it with other people. The ones who were at Emmy’s when I was there were very nice as well! 
2) The bathroom wasn't too clean and the room was a bit dusty, which made it difficult for me to sleep, being allergic to dust. As I paid a cleaning fee, to be fair, I was expecting a higher standard in terms of cleanliness. If I hadn't paid that, it would have been totally understandable. But again, as it is cheap and they are nice, I absolutely recommend staying at Emmy’s!
Perfect in every way.

Very modern and comfortable apartment. Great location and short walk to centre of Newtown, with an easy check in process - ideal for late check ins. Guillermo very easily contactable and accommodating

We enjoyed a five night stay in Sydney at this apartment.  The view is an amazing outlook over Hyde Park and the harbour as pictured.  It was wonderful to wake up to that view each morning. The location was great for exploring the city on foot and with public transport as buses and trains are close by, as are the iconic Sydney attractions and delicious restaurants and wine bars.  Hugo was great at communicating check in details and left a handy apartment guide with apartment and city info.  We really enjoyed our stay and would stay here again if back in Sydney.

Very homely and unfussy house with a great garden and lovely neighbours. Belinda was very thorough about advice on local ameneties and very professional to deal with in all matters. They left bikes and a surfboard for my use too.
This is a great place with plenty of space. If you had a family then this would be awesome
Five star location right in the heart of the CBD. Clean, convenient and great value. Will book again.

Pascale was awesome! I got a very bad sunburn and she was so helpful, getting me aloe Vera and coconut oil to help out. She was very attentive and helped us with everything from restaurant recommendations to a place to park our car. The location was perfect; not far from the city but away from the craziness of it all.
great location, omio was very nice and accomodating
A quite, relaxing area close to shops and public transport. The rooms are spacious and lovely big backyard.
Fantastic Location , nice house!

We have a great days in Dan’s place and Dan was very responsible host with  very quick responses 

Quite and peaceful loft with really lovely garden views from the balcony 
Super close to Central Station and very convenient location 
Will come back next time in Sydney

Great place. Perfect for families or adult groups for that matter. 
Great location. Across road from beach, cafe next door. 
Great host. Couldn't be more helpful.
Je recommande cet appartement  aux voyageurs  dans ce quartier, proche des commerces et des restaurants
Great View and Location. Robert is a great host.
Lovely studio apartment with great views. Neighborhood was nice with great food and a supermarket downstairs. Much better than getting a hotel.

Adrian's house is well located, just few minutes away from Hyde park and Oxford street. Everywhere is walkable and close to train station and bus stands to most of the area. The room is exactly same as the photo, there is a private balcony which I always spent my evening there with some good Aussie wines.
Communication is good before and throughout my stay, his housemate David is very friendly too.
Thanks Adrian!

We stayed at Eduardo and Yvonne's apartment for a week. For us it was perfect, my partner and I had our two teenage daughters with us for a "shopping" trip so each day we were heading off and out all over Sydney. The convenience of the flat was brilliant, we could just jump on the bus at the end of the road and head straight to town on the 333. Because we were blessed  with a week of blue sky and sunshine ( in July !!! ) most mornings we would just walk to bondi junction and grab breakfast / coffees then head for the trains. We felt really at home and relaxed each night taking in the views. The kitchen has everything you could ask for to whip up an evening meal which we did most nights. Both runners my partner and I ran most mornings around the park ( directly opposite ) then down to the beach tracks and back up bondi road to the flat, great work out and really fun running around the bays.  Would love to stay again if we get the chance and would recommend to all. Lovely couple and a great home. 
Cheers Craig and Claire

This is a nice room,i like this kitchen, if you like cooking is good, Very serious, enthusiastic Introduction  about his house, and i like the big windows of the house,the house clean and comfortable, next time will come, thank you,Cedric

Anat was a fantastic host from the very beginning. She was very responsive during the booking process and flexible with my family's arrival, which helped us greatly arriving in a new country. 

The house is a beautifully renovated 3 bedroom in South Coogee with tons of natural light and outdoor lounge space. The kitchen was well supplied for us to cook and bake, and we were surprised to see the BBQ was hooked up to the main gas line. Very cool!

We drove most of the trip, but there are also nearby bus lines that take you into Sydney proper in 45 mins or so. I highly recommend this BnB and am excited for all that have the opportunity to stay here :).

Great location, just off the M7 but quiet neighbourhood. Private entrance with car park right out the front. Easy checkin, even on Christmas Day. Comfy bed. Old bathroom with European style toilet in shower but worked well enough for us.
Wow. Stunning location. You can't get closer to the beach. Perfect distance from the corso.
Amazing place, very clean on arrival. They were always available for any questions we had. It was a great stay!

A nice place to stay for a single traveller. Close to the CBD and close to the Central station, you can easily discover Sydney from Joe's place.  Joe and his roommates were very welcoming and helpful. He gave me all the necessary information and I'm sure we would have had a nice chat but I had to rush out to a concert. The room is small but clean and has a comfy bed. I'd stay here again!
很好的房子 那一片都是华人区 环境很好 离超市商店很近 离最近的火车站步行15分钟 房间很干净 被子很舒服 还有个衣柜 叔叔阿姨人很好 性价比超高的
Fantastic place, amazing location,  and Arianne made it all so simple with her wonderful communication
Listing description accurate

Super convenient location, located in Haymarket between Chinatown and Surry Hills. The building location is on the quiet side of the block, but when you walk out the front door and turn either corner there are endless casual eateries with fantastic food, many open late too. Check out Boon Cafe and Yok Yor! Tumbalong Park and Darling Harbour are an 10 minute walk, Chinatown and Market City are steps away. And one block the opposite direction is the tip of Surry Hills!

Linda was extremely responsive and attentive from the moment the booking request was made. She went the extra mile to make sure I would locate and enter the apartment easily, that I would have amenities ready for me before I even set foot in the country. She showed genuine care and concern, which is at times uncommon even among friends. Her apartment was spotless, thoughtfully designed and easy to get to from the airport (using airport-hotel shuttle buses, stop at Y Hotel Sydney South). It is minutes from cafes and the train station. It has a gorgeously open balcony and generous sunlight during the day. As it is very well insulated, I imagine stays during winter would be comfortable as well. The only guests who should reconsider this apartment are those who are unable to use staircase, as the bedroom is a stairway-up from the living area. Linda is an excellent host with an amazing apartment and if I were more selfish, I would not have spoken too highly of it, so that I can have it more to myself! :)
Best that you could ever asked for

A lovely place, very well placed, and the house is really pretty. I didn’t had the luck to meet Kirsten in person as she was overseas but she was available super quickly by text.
I had an awesome stay :)

I nice tidy unit. However, if travelling in winter, just check if a heater is being provided as it gets very cold.
Also, if you need a car space, maybe ask if one can be blocked off or reserved for you, as the tenants take up all of the visitor spaces.
Great place , very modern, clean , easy to communicate with the hosts , definitely worth a stay

We really enjoyed our stay! Great location, modern and clean appartment and very helpfull and nice host. We can definently recommend. Note that the bed is snug for two large adults, but we didn't mind :o)
Susan was very hospitable and the cabin was very comfortable.
Suzanna was lightning fast at responding and a delight to deal with. The place is very clean, new and close walking distance to the sights of Sydney. Best Airbnb place I've stayed at.
The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place. Very relaxing. Owners very helpful.
Beautiful house and gorgeous pool and spa! Perfect for our family with young kids

Mike is a great host! we felt home from the first second. It is clean and very nice in his appartment. He knows nearly everything about Sydney and has an answer for all your questions. We would definitely go back to him for a second stay, once back in Sydney. The appartment has also an amazing view on the city from the roof top. within 10-15 min walk you are at the centre. You have all facilieties you need around. We liked it a lot!

Nous avons passé un séjour familial à Sydney magique. La maison de Steve et Jessica est idéalement située entre Bondi beach et toutes les autres plages , non loin du centre dans un quartier calme.
Steve et jessica se sont montrés très prévenants , nous laissant à disposition une maison confortable et sereine . La maison est grande , joliment décorée et moderne dans ses infrastructures .
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement pour une famille .

It was lovely to meet Jessica, she was an amazing host! The apartment was clean and comfortable. The location was great, with Paddington's amazing restaurants and shops just on our doorstep. Jessica was very friendly and helpful and we're definitely planning on staying here again next time we're in Sydney!
Great location, close to services, spacious room and made to feel very welcome.

pros
-great communication and availability to talk, even during holidays
 -willingness to resolve issues 
-location
-competitive price
-newly renovated kitchen, living and bed
-Apartment rooms look like the pictures

cons
-cockroaches present. before booking, ask if this is still a problem. we left after one night instead of the original length of booking from this issue (but hosts were willing to resolve without any problems)
-no wifi, even though it was listed as having in inclusions 
-only has a fan, no air con. This apartment heats quickly in summer weather, so air con is quite necessary in my opinion
-run down apartment complex (old)
-hallway is outdoors (I.e. when exiting the apartment, the hallways leading from the elevators to rooms are outdoors on balcony)

We had a great stay at Boudine’s place. The apartment was clean and tidy. Big plus was a very comfortable bed, good shower and fast wifi. Walking distance to Bondi Beach, shops and restaurant. 
I would absolutely recommend this place for anyone who likes to stay at Bondi but wants to be away from the busy streets.
Thanks for the great stay Boudine!

This accomodation is located in a nice place near to the main road. Easy to commute on public transport or your own. Very well connected. 
My room was nice and cosy. It has your own big screen TV and an updated ensuite. 
Cleanliness outside can be an issue but considering other guests staying there is understandable. I generally kept to my room and was happy.
Judy is an excellent host and is quick to resolve issues if you have any. I had a few hiccups the first day and she was quick to address them.
I don't mind staying here again if required. Very reasonably priced for what you get.

I can highly recommend Carole and Steve’s place  - what a lovely, light, spacious and spotlessly clean home! If you get a chance to rent the entire house, go for it. We stayed in the front two rooms of the house, in our own fairly separate area, and had sole use of a beautiful, spacious bathroom.  There are no kitchen facilities in this part of the house (as made clear in the ad) but there is a small fridge, kettle and toaster, as well as cutlery and crockery for guests to use. Meals are easy to find in any case as the house is close to some fantastic cafes, bars, pubs and restaurants – a real taste of Sydney’s cosmopolitan inner west. The house is in a peaceful, quiet, tree-lined street. Parking, if you need it, is easy to find nearby, or even out the front if you're lucky (check the parking signs to be sure though). Public transport – buses, trains –  in easy walking distance. Carole and Steve and Snoop dog were perfect AirBnB hosts, very friendly and considerate, without being intrusive. We were lucky to have found them! Absolutely recommended.

This place is as beautiful as it looks in the pictures. It is clean, tidy, well-decorated and makes you feel like home. The living room is nice and bright in the day and if you need a break from drinking in the bars and pubs at night (which are within walking distance by the way), the balcony is a nice place to relax too. Lucile has been super helpful and friendly in providing us with all the necessary details required for our stay. If there is one thing you need to know about this place, it is that the beds are really comfy! It's like sleeping in your favorite clean, old t-shirt. Be careful, you might find it hard to peel yourselves off the bed in the mornings. Thank you once again for sharing your beautiful home with us!

Gunsen’s place was amazing... the apartment was beautifully renovated and fully equipped with everything. It’s only a 5 minute walk to the beach and shops which is very convenient and has a great big balcony to sit and enjoy the fresh air! I would definitely recommend Gunsen’s place... I know I will be going back again some time!
Good location. But building quite old.

Brendan is a great host and has a lot to offer, especially if you never been Sydney. His apartment is wonderful and quiet. Walking distance to shops and public transportation. Also the view of Bondi beach is spectacular from his apartment. I would most definitely stay here again if I came to Sydney again!

Brendas place is absolutely wonderful. It's got a huge terrace with lots of space to hang out and relax. The apartment itself is wonderfully decorated and very cosy. The loacation is also brilliant - just a small stroll down to the beach and an easy bud travel to the city centre. We stayed here in just over a month with our to kids and loved it!

We never met Dave and Debbie in person, however must say that they were very hospitable, even from a distance. We were welcomed with a bottle of wine and a fruit platter ... The flat is situated in a residential area that has great views on the city. Recommendable!

We are an ex Bronte Beach family and so we know the area well. We were thrilled to find such a gorgeous place to stay in such a fabulous position - so close to the beach and cafes yet so quiet and peaceful. We’ll be back if we get a chance!
Very accommodating host. Easy to communicate with. Would stay again.
Nice and quiet place to stay!

Great cozy apartment. Just as described.  Quiet neighborhood, or at least where this place is was quiet.  A short walk to the Kings Cross subway station so it is well situated.  The staff at the Regent Court where you pick up the keys was super friendly and helpful and very responsive via email.  I would absolutely recommend to others or stay there again myself the next time I'm in Sydney.

Staying with Allen was very comfortable. Centurian park next to the corner, Bondi Junction 7 min walk with shopping mall and plenty of cafes.
House was very clean and brand new. Large and modern kitchen with dining area (you can use it for laptop working as well). Room is small but tidy and contains everything you need.
Allen was very kind and help whith everithing I ask him.
Highly recommended as for people who arrived at first time to Sydney as for inveterate traveller.

My daughters and I had a great stay at Peter’s place! It was clean and spacious and the location is just great. Up in the hills with a view of the ocean and the valley below and only a few minutes drive to shops, restaurants and the beaches. Peter is a great host and we had a great experience overall!
Matt was an incredible host! He made our stay as stress-free as possible and went above and beyond our expectations! Highly recommend staying with him at his gorgeous apartment! Great location, too!

This place is a gem. Maria is super friendly and generous with her time and pantry supplies. The water really is that close!! The location spectacular to look at and snorkel or just chill out with a coffee on the walkway. The room is very spacious and the window seat just makes you want to connect with your inner cat. We had an amazing time and can't wait to plan another trip to Sydney.

Staying at Craige's and Leonie's place was a great experience. The description was accurate and the rooms were clean and tidy. The appartment is very nice and just a five minute walk from the beach with heaps of nice restaurants just around the corner. Craige and Leonie are very friendly and nice people that provided excellent advise and support. I hope that I will have the chance to stay at their place  when I visit Sydney again.

This is a great, well presented apartment. It is located in the heart of Sydney within easy walking distance of everything. Gavin is a great host keeping in really good communication all the time. He was very flexible and allowed us to have a great relaxing stay. Highly recommended.
Nice place nice host

Our stay at Alex‘s apartment was great. The house is in a great location and the rooms were clean and well equipped. We didn‘t meet the hosts but they left us a notice with helpful information. We really enjoyed our stay and recommend this apartments to others! Thank you!!
Thea was a lovely host and an excellent—and speedy—communicator.
Sally was excellent to deal with, location of house was perfect for seeing Sydney handy to both ferries and buses.  Very Homely
The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
It was great. The place is clean and convenient, located very close to the train station.
Right on the waterfront, close to beaches. Everything walkable. A great place to stay

Much better than the photos. Tastefully done up decor. (Even the collection of books)Nice and clean,had everything we needed. 
Lucy and Ralph lovely people,very warm welcome and very friendly. Happy to have found this place. 40 minutes from cbd,great getaway!would love to visit again
Great place. A bit noisy when a train goes pass

Belinda and her husband were warm and friendly hosts during our stay and the clean, beautifully designed and cosey but spacious studio was everything we could have wanted for a quiet weekend away. We enjoyed watching the sunset at Port Hacking, a lovely dock across the road from Belinda's home and driving further south through the National Park. Highly Recommended for a relaxing weekend trip just an hour away from Sydney.
Very close to airport, comfortable bed

This is a great place to stay! Very clean and fresh apartment, close to beautiful coogee beach and easy to travel around in Sydney. The hosts are great, made you feel welcome and had good communication. I strongly recommend this place!
over all good service

Fabulous family sized house! Very clean & Tidy. Well equiped ammenities. Delighted to find toiletries provided as we forgot to pack ours. Very close to train station, IGA and restaurants (all within walking distance). Alice and Richard were great hosts, willing to provide any request. Will definitely book this very affordable house again.

My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

Best AirBnb we had so far. The apartment is lovely, clean and tidy. It has everything you need for a short or long stay. It's one block away from the main bus in glebe which takes you to central or the city (from there you can go everywhere). It's near a lot of really nice cafe's and bars and several parks. Helena was great in helping us with everything we needed and more!
The only thing I would advice is to be sure to find the apartment beforehand because its a little bit hard to find by the number, ask your helena for directions, she'll be more than happy to help!

Hi , Really enjoyed staying in this beautiful house. It looked just as good as the pictures and everything was nice and clean. The garden was beautiful, really well done. It was close to the beach. 
Frances.
Ben's place is in the perfect location. Had a lot of fun staying there.

Magnifique séjour. 
La maison est super jolie, très pratique, facile à prendre en main... un vrai décor de poupées, idéal pour les familles ou plusieurs couples. Un merveilleux accueil avec boîte de chocolats et vin blanc... bref, c'était la perfection et la douceur de vivre à l'australienne !
Balmain est un quartier idéalement situé et très agréable. En ferry, on est à 15 mn de Darling Harbour ou de Circular Quay.
Alles gut. Sehr zu empfehlen. Super gelegene whg. In der nähe vom hippen Quartier Newtown. Alles gut und tolle tipps.
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Leena was a very welcoming and approachable host. She was also accommodating to our needs. We really had a good time. The house was spotless clean and well equipped. The shopping centre and public transport was within walking distance and the neighbourhood was very green and friendly.
Very good staying! Highly recommend!

Me and my girlfriend stayed eleven nights at Andreas place and we were really sad to leave. Very good room with a nice own bathroom. Also a nice kitchen with a big living room. We really liked the gym, pool and the sauna because they are very clean and almost always empty. So you can relax really well because you are almost always alone. We used it almost every day!
The location is perfect as it is only 5 minutes by feet to many different bus stops, coles, restaurants and bars. The bus takes you within 10 minutes to the city but you can walk there aswell. 
Andrea is a very friendly person and answered always very fast when we had any questions and her roommates are also very friendly and helpful. 
I have nothing bad to say to the place of Andrea and we wish we stayed longer.

A very good place to stay, particularly if you are in Bundeena without a car as the shops are only 10 mins walk away.  Beach very close, with lovely swimming. Altogether a very peaceful place, apart from the noisy kookaburras!  Inclined to be a bit chilly in the mornings (October) until the sun was well up, as it is quite shady, so be sure to take a warm sweater.  
A charming cottage and highly recommended.

I would definitely recommend this place for other travellers . Bella is very helpful and friendly. There is a bus stop right in front of the building and it only takes 10 mins to CBD. Plus, her apartment is super nice and clean.

We stayed at this little quaintly situated sweetheart of an apartment for 3 nights in June and would return. Fits 2 people no problems, and the decorations surround you with a glow of warmth and style. If Location to some of Sydney's great lifestyle treats is an important point for your visit, then this place is well worth considering. See you again Serena!
Super friendly and accommodating host in a great location.

Thanks Tiger! Your place was just great for what I needed - spotlessly clean, the bed the height of comfort and the location near the airport excellent. Your communication and welcome made me feel very at home! This was a really great stay.
 I suggest using the bus to and from airport. It's quicker, cheaper (A$2.10 and avoids the unjust cost of the train (A$9.20 to travel 2 stations!). The bus is about 100 metres away.

Great place to stay, great location!!!
The apartment was clean,cozy and had everything needed for a comfortable stay.
Jeremy was a very caring and helpful host.
I recommend Gracious Darlinghurst Terrace as a great place to explore Sydney!

The location was very convenient, and the apartment was clean and new - perfect for my girlfriend and I. My only issue was that the sink was quite small, which made rinsing plates, pots and pans quite difficult before putting them in the dishwasher. Overall, it was a great stay, and dealing with Nicki before the stay was a pleasure. Recommended for someone who wants to stay within walking distance to the city.
Great little place in a quiet street in Bronte. William was a great host, emjoyed our stay!

Don’t book this house. It is incredibly dirty full of insects all over the bedrooms, kitchen, and toiltet. My family and me are VERY dissatisfied with this house. Really bad. We tried to contact the owner but they are not polite at all
Anitta was warm and welcoming with fantastic instructions on getting the most from the house and surrounding area.

第一次使用airbnb,这个平台确实不错｡很方便｡租到很不错的房间｡交通交通十分方便｡地处热闹街区里面的安静｡市中心,繁华热闹,5分钟到达繁华的大型豪华商场,超市,购物生活方便｡5分钟可以到达中央火车站｡十分钟左右可以散步情人港广场,10分钟左右,可以步行去享受唐人街中餐美味｡西餐当然遍地都是,15分钟以内可以漫步海德公园｡30分钟步行,可以到达悉尼歌剧院｡屋子干净整洁,设施齐全,你也可以自己做饭,因为厨房设施齐全｡房东沟通方便,中文,粤语,英文都可以与之交流｡耐心热情,服务周到｡又问必答,还可以给出不错的建议｡总之,家庭旅游,商务出差,短中期的居住,都是不错的选择｡很好的平台,很好的房东,值得选择｡以后还会有机会来的

Keythia was a wonderful Host. 
She made myself and partner feel very at home. 
The apartment was very clean and tidy with all necessary amenities. 
The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were 5 star. 
Keythia left out a beautiful selection of breakfast treats. 
I would highly recommend this apartment. 
Many thanks 
Mark & Rebecca

Allison was EXTREMELY helpful and accommodative. Lovely girl, and so are the other 2 ladies. Comfortable bed, plenty of space in the wardrobe.  Newtown is a fantastic location, a couple minute walk to the train station and a 10minute train into Circular Quay.
Don was a really helpful host who responded straight away to all our questions. The apartment itself is very nice and also located in a great area. Would definitely stay here again!
Fantastic location, close to beach, park and some great restaurants. The place was very well presented, clean and owner very responsive to questions.

The appartment is very nice, 2nd floor, 200 mt from the beach... Harnan is a very nice personat the disposal for any information that you need during my dungeon at home. I was like at home and never fails nothing. Muy buena onda :)
Really enjoyed staying with Serena and Mohmed!

Beautiful place in a Great Location.
Perfect host, Harry was very flexible to requests and punctuatal with replying. 
On arrival we met Harry's girlfriend - also lovely who was super helpful and stayed in contact with us the whole
Weekend for any thing we needed.

My overall experience on Dangar Island was wonderful. Ann created a sense of being cared for, in a relaxed environment. Ann is a wonderful and interesting host with great historical knowledge of the local area. Meal time was fun; some of the food picked from the garden, the rest fresh, delicious and made to suit my individual requirements. Eating breakfast overlooking a pretty garden and watching the river made a pleasurable start to each day. My bed was comfortable and as promised by my host, big soft towels to use in the shared bathroom. The house itself is as interesting as its gracious host and well worth the short ferry ride to visit and stay in for a night or two. Most enjoyable!

Vivian's loft apartment is perfectly located, close to great coffee spots and transport. Ten minutes from the beach and the stunning Bronte to Bondi coastal walk- not to be missed. The apartment has beautiful fixtures, a fantastic bed and a great shower. We would definitely stay at Viv's again, she was a generous and helpful host.

The place was great; clean and quiet with modern and tasteful appointments. Large living/dining space. The location fantastic. Nicole was only a call away and always happy to offer advice when needed. Would definitely be back.

Hugo was very welcoming when we first arrived and told us about his favourite local cafes and restaurants around the area which were awesome. The place was very artfully furnished and located conveniently next to the station. We would highly recommend his place. Loved it! Thanks, Hugo! :))

Muñeca and her mother both made us feel like family during our stay. The apartment was easy to find, right across the train station. Pictures really undersell the place, it's beautifully decorated penthouse and feels like a comfy home. 

We enjoyed our stay very much and highly recommend it.
Awesome spot. Very clean and spacious. Would definitely recommend

The apartment exceeded our expectation with its view and its modernity, its within walking distance from central station, Chinatown, 10mins walk to Pyrmont bay, and tram stop to fish market. The host replies rather quickly to any request or simply any questions. Most housing appliances were provided. Highly recommended

Kate was a great host and had an exceptional apartment. Kate was amazing to deal with through her quick responses and friendly attitude. We had a wonderful time in Manly in her apartment. The apartment itself was stylish, clean, had great facilities and offered exceptional beachfront views. The garage offered safe and easy parking for our stay in Manly and the secondary car park in front of the garage was an added bonus. With the apartment being a walking distance to all main attractions, it made the apartment location a perfect stay for us.

We left Kate’s apartment with a better stay then expected, we loved the apartment and our stay in Manly. We highly recommend Kate and her apartment!

Great place to stay. Very clean, close to public train system, shops, restaurants, and even a supermarket (Woolworths) a block away. Patricia is a great host and super friendly. Lots of history in this area and the locals will definitely have good conversations about it at local restaurants or bars. Very nice social part of town. My dad and I really enjoyed our stay here and highly recoment this location and host.

Gail’s Guest House is a hidden gem in a beautiful garden setting. The space is brand new and was immaculately presented, with a lot of attention to detail. Gail and Kim were very accommodating and Gale baked fresh bread, which was a nice surprise. 
The location is great, close to the airport and only 5mins walk to some really nice beaches.
I would highly recommend this place for a weekend getaway or longer.
Natalia is a great host, I would definitely recommend staying at her place. The unit is very clean, wifi works perfectly. The room is big and the location amazing, walking distance to Coogee Beach.
Beautiful and clean space, great for a quick Sydney trip.
住这里非常舒服,干净,东西齐全｡就像自己家一样,非常满意｡周边交通便利,购物便利,下次来悉尼依然会首选Francoise的家
Alex was a great and flexible host and was very quick to respond to our changing requests
Muy céntrico. Poco limpio.
Really nice position and Really clean
Great no frills, no nonsense place where the host respects your privacy.  Close to transport / restaurants  and a stone throw away to the city.

Kariem's place was cosy and close to the Macquarie lighthouse where we walked to in the morning for the sunrise :) 

Additionally, he has lots of snacks! & a great Xbox system. Also, he gave us helpful suggestions on the places to eat around our area :) Thanks for having us!!

I had a great time staying with Anya, Urs and Finn. The room is light and bright with lots of space, and on a quiet road in Bondi that's still close to all the action and within walking distance to the Junction.
The place was really clean and Anya was great with her communication (particularly as I booked really last minute). 
I would definitely recommend their home as a great, peaceful base from which to explore Bondi.
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Bill's house is an opulent oasis. We were 3 colleagues in town for a trade show, and this was a wonderful base to relax in. 2 mins walk from the light rail station made it really easy to get around. The third bedroom is up a flight of quite steep stairs. There are good hand rails, but those with limited mobility would be better in the downstairs rooms. Beautiful things surround you throughout the property. The beds were very comfortable and there were plenty of amentites. A true home away from home. Highly recommended.
The house was very clean and spacious. The hosts were really great and sent us detailed information for check-in. Overall, would come back here!
The host canceled this reservation 196 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Patty’s house was beautiful decorated, nice and close to famous Bondi, remarkably quiet being only meters to all the action. Patty always responded quick and answered all questions I had for her. She was very flexible with check out asking me first what time I would like...
I would recommend to anyone who wants to be amongst the action but can look forward to some peace and quiet 
5 stars ⭐️

We did not meet Heidi but she was very friendly on the phone and always available for any questions that we had. We adored our stay in her beautiful house. It was exactly how she stated, clean, tidy and perfect for what we needed. The neighbourhood was very quiet and the neighbours were friendly. The location was perfect for us. Close to the bus, shopping centers, cafes, supermarkets and ferry station. Thanks for a wonderful stay in your gorgeous house Heidi.

We have stayed at many Airbnb homes, this is our all time FAVOURITE place! The apartment is brand new, perfect layout, dual level which offers both privacy + space. For even the most fussiest of travellers - I highly recommend you book as this you couldn't hope for a better team then L'Abode, so thank you for making our holiday so great!!

This studio out the back of caths house was a pleasure to stay in. The clever design makes use of a small space and the decore was stylish. Cath treated us with her homemade treats which were a real welcomed surprise.
We enjoyed looking out onto her veggie patch, the morning sun lit upnthe big photo of clouds on the wall and was lovely to wake to every morning.
Highly recommended.

Awesome place!
Unfortunately I couldn't meet Jason. He was on vacation, so his friend Stu hosted us. He was just on time when we checked in & out, and very friendly. 
House is just like in the pictures. Nice living room with wide open terrace. The one of the best thing is there is a small park where you can oversee the Bondi beach in just 50m away. Also around 5min walking distance to beach.
The main room has double bed and empty drawers to keep things. And second room has 2 bed and 1 bed-like shelf.
There is no A/C (small room has small one, bue can cover the whole house), but in day you can open window. there is breeze so it is not so hot. In night, each room has fan, so no need for AC.
There is laundry room with laundry machine and dryer. Bondi beach is quite more humid than Sydney. so it was very convenient.
I'll definitely visit again with my family someday. This is perfect place for family. I so envy Jason to live this house:)

Overall, I rate Tim's place 5 stars. Its a great place to stay for sight seeing. Its very close to the train station, city and airport. The place was clean and had a large clean shower. He was easy to talk to. I would stay again.

We had a wonderful stay and the flat was everything we had hoped for. The extra help with cot, pram and even toys for our 15-month old made it so easy. And the flat was in a great area with a few brunch places and restaurants nearby as well as Bondi Junction just a short bus ride away. Overall we'd highly recommend staying here. Thanks Moira!
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a wonderful relaxing stay at a beach break and lake. The location was great and the apartment was positioned directly between the beach and lake. It was also a very short drive to other nothshore beaches such as whale beach and palm beach. The host Terri was lovely, helpful, and very responsive to any queries.  The next door neighbours were also very friendly and welcoming which made you feel at home. Overall we had a great stay and didn't want to leave!
My daughter and her friends stayed at Danny's place. Great location, easy check in and check out. Spacious for the group of friends!

Our hosts were very friendly and welcoming. It was the first time they have listed this apartment with air bnb, and they helped us out at very short notice. They welcomed us to help ourselves to anything eg fridge and pantry. We were well equipped so didn't need to, but the generosity was appreciated. They supply a Nespresso coffee machine and pods too!  The location is great. Walking distance to Manly Harbour, Manly ferry, cafes, bars and shops.
Interesting and peaceful green nature reserve in front of the apartment which we walked through to access Manly harbour. Glimpses of the harbour. Not a lot of street parking, but we managed ok most of the time. Car not needed tho if you are exploring Manly and with the ferry so close! The Friday night international food markets very close by. Just a short walk over to the surf side and round to beautiful Shelly Beach.
We had everything we needed for a 2 night stay, and would recommend our hosts and their apartment.

Amazing location and view, we had to extend our stay as we couldn't part with the view and outdoor living area.
So close to have a swim or head to Bondi entertainment/shopping area.

The accommodation was perfect
Hosts super friendly and helpful
Overall experience wonderful
Stay here

Poor communication with the real estate agency next door that runs this AirBnb. I had cockroaches all through my room. Permanent residents felt like this was staying in commission housing flats and not a hotel as the name suggested.

Stephanie is a delightful,thoughtful and generous host. She was prompt in responding to questions and left her home in a welcoming manner. The cottage is delightful,comfortable and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay there. Glebe is just wonderful with lots of atmosphere and close to many of Sydney's highlights.
This was our first foray into Airbnb and we are hooked! It was an excellent initiation and no doubt a hard act to follow!
I thoroughly recommend Stephanie and her cottage and Glebe. I hope that I can stay there again.
The room is very clean and tidy. The house is so quiet and Robbie is very polite.

The apartment was not clean and had dog urine on all the carpets. It took 24 hours for 1 of the rugs to get replaced and the new one seemed masked with odor spray. The owner told me the place was clean after the first day but the urine smell was still in the apartment which kept us locked in our rooms while we weren’t out and about in the city. It was very unpleasant even after getting the cleaning fee and one nights stay refunded to us. It was a total break down in communication between the management company and the own, but that shouldn’t be at my expense after I had just taken a 14 hour flight from California.
Great accomodation. Clean and had everything you needed. The location is amazing right at Bondi, it can be quite noisy at night time though. Thanks for a great stay Matt!

A great experience the first time live at home locals, owner of the house is very intimate, all kinds of problems can patiently answer. The house is very comfortable, the family can barbecue, appliances complete, the location is great, go out to take a bus into the city center, if you look at Sydney's New Year's fireworks, it would be a good choice, you can see the panoramic view, if you come to Sydney This would be an excellent choice.

Imogen’s place was absolutely great. It was very clean and the room was large and away from the common spaces. She is friendly, and super accommodating. Her Bondi Beach location couldn’t be better. It’s just a few minutes walk from the beach and right in the middle of many cafes/shops/grocery stores. The location is quiet and felt safe at all times. Would definitely stay again and recommend it!
Apartment was amazing, exactly what's needed for a few friends or a family. Location was great as we did not want to be directly in the cbd and cleanliness spotless, would definitely stay again.

Lovely cosy place, perfect as a start point to the Coastal Walk. Scott was extremely friendly and helpful.

Private accommodation, with a separate entrance and great independent back garden.
Close to everything Manly has to offer

We spent two weeks in this apartment really well located. Stephen was really helpful and replied really quickly to all of our questions. The apartment was really clean when we arrived. It is located near to the Harbour Bridge (10min walking) where you can have a really nice view on the Opera House. It was really easy to go to the CBD by the train, Milsons Point station is only 10min walking (and then 1 stop to go to Town Hall) or you can still walk on the bridge to go to Circular Quay.  The kitchen is really well furnished with a big fridge, microwawe, oven, and gas hotplate. We had a really good time, the area is really quiet, some convenience stores are really close to the apartment and there is a COLES and ALDI in North Sydney around 10min walking. I think it's one of the best whole apartment you can find in Sydney regarding quality/price/location. Thanks again Stephen!

Very dirty: Beds, Kitchen, Floors.
Location very nice.
If clean, nice place

Sabrinas place was very spacious, located conveniently and mostly well equipped. It was perfect for exploring the city since it's connected well to public transport and you could also take a walk into the cbd. The only downside is the missing Wifi (which I was unaware when booking) but I guess this will be fixed soon since they just recently renovated the apartment. The apartment was very clean (only the windows and mirrors not 100%- not so important) Communication with Sabrina was easy and pleasant. Would recommend to stay here, especially a larger group of people or a family!
We had a lovely stay. The apartment was clean and perfect for a family with children. Close to Parks and beach. Overall we enjoyed the apartment!
